reviews.review: Breath taking Views!!!!!!!!!. Situated in New Dubai...The Marina is home to amazing skyscrapers, yatch clubs, shopping facilities..It is a very touristy place with many restaurants..Location is close to the metro...must visit if in Dubai

Dinner recommendation. We were not disappointed with either the restaurant or the setting....we arrived in the evening but dusk might be good. Food mainly Italian but really enjoyed our experience. Needed a taxi to get there so beware of rush hour hold ups and the metre ticking over.
Boat party! . We booked a private boat for the evening for a party with 30 people. The marina staff were super helpful and accommodating. The area is clean and safe

If you like being overcharged.... Avoid like the plague! If you'd like to be overcharged with no recourse, then this is the place for you. The ambience and views are lovely, but you have no choice when they blatantly overcharge you for drinks not served Beware & be forewarned. Pay as you go or risk being charged for drinks not served with no ability to contradict a thing. Any of the Pier 7 spots work more professionally than this spot!
Fantastic View. First night in Dubai we were there and it is really amazing view. Structures are very excellent. Experience wise was very good.

Very beautiful and a very wonderful marina. Thank you for such a beautiful marina and keeping your marina and country Dubai so wonderful clean and amazingly fantastic. Can you please tell Africa and the country I am from South Africa how to be an example like Dubai ✈️✈️✈️✈️ - I can't wait until I can visit the marina in Dubai soon again

Good views and Ambience. Met some friends here on our first night in Dubai and loved the outside lounge area. Very modern feel with great views of the Marina. Staff were good and kept our drinks flowing. One of my favourite spots for an evening drink
A must visit. Spent considerable time at the Dubai Marina taking in its ambiance and space...excellent restaurants as well.

Great hangout on the Marina for ex-pats and locals.. I love the outside seating area overlooking the marina when its cool enough to sit outside! Ladies night is always a plus. Great views up and down the marina. Great bar food too.

Wonderful setting.. Had an evening 'Friday brunch' at the Yacht club. Excellent value. Food delicious and plenty of choice, especially sea food. Staff attentive and filled our glasses without prompting. The setting is wonderful and well worth visiting.

Just find it and got there!. This place is so spectacular and you can rent any boat ( also private ), if you want to go there, best time is befor sunset to see everything better and enjoy...
Best wishes for you....
Good for lunch. Not a bad spot for lunch, or a few beers in the evening in the bar. Nice to look out at the yachts and daydream!

Definatly a ride to take. Do take a private Yatch ride at Dubai Marina to enjoi the view of skyscrapers and the architecture. We book a ride at the sunset for 2 hrs so that we can enjoi the beautifull nature at its best. This is a bit expensive but was a life time adventure, not to miss !!!

Impressive. Very glam and stylish, fantastic views and was only a short walk from the hotel. Food and drinks were good, nice cocktails! Staff friendly and informative about what was available around the area.
Dinner Alone at the Yacht Club!. Great appetizer food, including sushi and calamari, at reasonable prices. Good service too! Nice to watch the marina from the upper deck.

Modern Town of Dubai. One of the best place to hang out in dubai.... its a 7 km long walk called marina walk... There is a nice Yacht Club with different size, Pier 7 restaurant, Marina mall and awesome views of all iconic and Sky Scraper buildings of Dubai Marina.. specially Twisted tower... I love the place in day its different and again the lights of dubai marina is like wow feeling....

Great Breakfast!. After being in Europe for 4 weeks we were glad to meet up with a local friend who suggested we go for breakfast at the Yacht Club. We finally got to have our bacon and eggs, served in a hot pan! Perfect!

Worlds Biggest Marina. Since we visited in September, it was really hot and humid. However its good place to be with lots of hotels around. There is Reel Theater and big food court in Dubai Marina Mall which can also be visited while walking around the marina.
ladies night. I have been to a few ladies night over the years in Dubai but this one is classy but not over the top. Like the dress code . Food is great too and the offer for gent is not bad either
Excellent. Excellent place, try to go a bit early to find a place. The staff are very kind and attentive, we will definitely come back.
Nice place. It's good place to visit in Dubai with a very good view, where you can take a boat trip, and have a meal in one of the restaurants there.
Great to visit and lots to do. Great to visit at night time and really comes to life. Lots to do and great places to eat, can come here every night and have something different to do.

Gorgeous yacht club. A beautiful club with nice restaurant , coffee shop , lounge inside . It is an excellent place for friends and family to gather together . Surrounding with wonderful views . A great place for visitors to pay a visit . Especially for new comer to Dubai .

Wow factor. If you are visiting the Marina at night, be sure to put this bar at the top of your visit list.
Everything attached to this premises has a world class level to it, the service, drinks and setting have all really got the wow factor.

great!. This is one of my favorite places in Dubai, the place where you always want to come back! The food is very good and I will definitely come back.
Thanks to the staff for the good service.

Late evening cruise. We went on a cruise and it Was nice with a buffet dinner lots of variety. Good sight seeing opportunity.
Service was excellent.
Not to be missed. This is one of the most impressive development of Dubai. Go there in the evening and take a stroll around.
Great place. It is really very nice place. Absolutely deserve top place in his rang. Very friendly stuff, great service and I want strongly recommend this place!!!
Fantastic breakfast. Only ever visited for breakfast, it's great and I highly recommend. Great service, great quality, great location, great price.

Over rated . Limited food menu primarily catering to British taste
Prices too high
Service low specially on weekends
Place needs refurbishment and live music
Chic. Had a superb evening at the Yacht club. A sense of style and elegance and wonderful views onto the Marina.

Quiet these days. The refit means the place now had a much better layout with much better access to the bar - not that it matters however as the last two times I've been it was very quiet.
I remember when this place was rammed on a Thursday evening.

Lovely. Lovely area to chill and have a boat ride with options.
Smooth, relaxing and fun in this not too expensive excursion.
Fantastic food and service. A fantastic evening with lovely seafood in amazing surroundings. What's not to like? Make sure you book as very popular and understandably so. Lovely!

I always love to be there!. Marina yacht club one of my favourite place among yacth clubs. You feel elegance and luxory. Plenty of chic restaurants and bars are welcoming you. Prices are affordable and foods are so good. You may dine while watching the yachtes and sky scrapers. You can easily acces by train (metro). Don't miss.!
Beautiful. Great views of the marina from Lebanese restaurant at Pier 7. The food is delicious too! Besides beautiful view there is also the Dubai mall next door. A great experience overall.

Lovely views looking at all the yachts. Love it ,, looking at all the yachts. :)) recommended in winter season Food and drinks are well priced, always there is good offers and play lounge music throughout the evening which is so romantic, you can see a lot of yachts, also you can book a yacht and have a fun ride. There are lots of restaurants with Al the cuisine... Easiest way to get here is take a metro and get down at Dubai marina stop,from there it's walking distance 15 min walk.

never been back. Been here twice first sometime ago in the bar we asked the barman if he had fresh orange, yes, when it came it wasn't fresh I pointed it out that he said he did he just arrogantly said don't have fresh orange, we didn't want what he poured out and he aggressively snatched the drink and poured it down the sink, I said keep the other drink as well an we left. many months later I wanted a Sunday type British roast dinner which you can get in the restaurant on Saturday, I phoned at 12.30pm asked for a table for one at 6pm I thought go early before it got busy as there was only me, I was just about to leave shortly after 5 pm the young lady said sorry we are fully booked so you can't have the table, I said you weren't fully booked when I call hours earlier, she said ill put you on the waiting list, after laughing I said don't bother I won't ever come there again, I know a restaurant needs to make money but to do that well you can keep it, plenty of others. I also sent an email to the person in charge, never got a reply shows what they think of customers.
smooth sailing!!. The Dubai Marina Yacht club is a great palce to go after work or on a weekend to watch the boats. great food and drinks
Sightseeing . A good place to look around and have evening there. We were in Dubai only for few hours so we only went to look around and enjoy the high rise sightseeing

Nice patio, good location. Very nice patio (in "winter") to enjoy the great Marina-views at night. Food is good and value for money. Easy to find parking and very close to the Marina Mall.Highly recommended for a get together.

Disappointing food. Great service and lovely atmosphere but the food was disappointing. My friend had pizza that he said was nice but the fish and chips that I had was mainly batter with some dry cod in the middle.

Nice cruise, get the right one though!!. Cruise and dinner with about 20 of us. The cruise was run by Xclusive Yachts and was a life boat which seated a lot of people. The boat was NOT a Dhow. The food was very nice, buffet style and the entertainment was over speakers. However the view was what we went for, great view along the marina and a good view of the Burj Al Arab before turning back to head back. I would go on this trip again, the Dhows look too small and if you don't have air conditioning please prepare to sweat and be uncomfortable in 75% humidity. Check this before you book.

Good Lunch venue. I went to the Yacht Club on a Tuesday Afternoon around 3pm for having a quick lunch. It was not very busy - having only 3 other tables when I arrived. Service was very attentive and friendly - it was even a little too much in regards of question about how my food and drinks are. Sometimes "less is more" in regards of proper service.Food was delicious. Cocktail has been OK.To sum it up: great venue, great view, good service and therefor recommendable.

Loved every bit of it. . It was a great experience. We were a group of around 15 people, adults and kids. We had had a great time. It was a a fun filled trip. We saw almost all of Dubai, from the water. We started at a time, when we could enjoy, day light, sun set and then the city lights. Memorable experience if you have a large group of family or friends.
Relaxed and stylish with great views. Great terrace/balcony from where to enjoy great views of Dubai Marina in refined surroundings. Restaurants available here too to cater for big and small wallets!
boats. Definitely worth strolling by to look at the boats. Try to eat at one of the nearby restaurants. Be mindful of the heat.
Amazing Dubai😊. Verry accomodating and friendly yatch captain..it cost not much for 3 persons.excellent.Though its a little bit humid but its really worth the price.
Had to go here to feel young at heart. Semi enjoyable, everything was a little pricy, as a late 50 yr. old, felt a little out of place. Smoked my first She-shaw( Who-ka). Didn't stay after dark.
Decent spot. Very chillaxing venue during the week. Nice view of the Marina. Gets crazy on tuesdays during ladies night (if you are looking for relaxing avoid). Not a bad spot.

Great area to hang out. I was invited and so walked around here one evening and really enjoyed myself.
Very atmospheric and well lit environment with great places to eat and drink.
Classy.
Perfect for ladies night. Lovely atmosphere, great crowd and lovely drinks. The perfect spot to hang out with friends for ladies night.
Nothing so special. Only good thing about this cruise is that you can have a good view of modern Dubai from the yacht. Food was average and so the ambience was.

nice dinner view. i went for dinner on Tuesday night with loads of ppl , the food is quite expensive but it was ladies night so all girls got free drinks almost all night . the got a very nice marina and yacht views . you can celebrate any special occasion there or have a romantic dinners but not on Tuesday as its always full .

Alcohol in Dubai. In Dubai you won`t find alcohol in supermarkets because it`s forbbiden by law. There are few clubs that are allowed to serve alcohol though. Marina Yacht Club it`s one of them! Take notice that clubs in Dubai are between 8 pm to 2 am. There are few closing at 3 am but not after this hour!

Great in Winter. The Marina Yacht Club is best visited during the cooler months where you can sit outside and soak up the magnificent views of the Dubai Creek and all its activity. Having dined there on numerous occasions over the past 15 years it just keeps getting better.
Elegance and simplicity. Very nice place for coffee,lunch and dinner. Splendid view to the Marina. Magic atmosphere with nice soft music, elegant style in everything and polite staff.
Beautiful place to visit. Just beautiful place to visit modern and very developed. Although is hot during summer time still is nice place to visit.
OUTSTANDING. We hired our own private yact and boarded here. We could see lot of expensive adventure yachts berthed there. view in the late evening is great
Beautiful scenery at night!. Its open for public, its a place for you to have a perfect diner with a view! I book the dinner cruise from the travel tours and i love it! recommended!

nice. It is a district in Dubai, UAE. Built along a two mile stretch of Persian Gulf shore, it is basically meant for residential purposes. When its construction will be complete, it will house over 120,000 people in the residential towers and villas. It is an artificial canal city and a heavenly abode for the families living there. People can experience the presence of marine wildlife entering the lake because of its proximity to the sea.
Marina Yacht. Good 2 hour private yacht experience for 4 people having a round of marina and Burj Al Arab..evening time best

Luxury and incredible design of skyscrapers. Incredible experience of this place. Many huge skyscrapers, bars, restaurants etc. The best are walks along bay at the night. This modern city place never do not sleep. Luxury yachts and infinite party. The adventure. Super city´s promenade!

Best Hangover Breakfast. Best hangover cure in Dubai. Go have a delicious full English breakfast overlooking the marina and watch the world and boats go by. My favourite spot to drink coffee and chat with friends about the previous night's antics.
The palce to be for dinner. This is the best place in Dubai to have dinner. The choice of restaurants and the large terrases make it an enjoyment to eat there.
Went for a cruise. Went with my family for a Dow dinner cruise . The yacht was very beautiful and well decorated . The food was below average.
Spectacular View. Try to visit during the month of September to February. Nice Buffet spread for dinner with amazing Local dance performance on yacht.

Great way to spend the evening.. Marina Yacht Club is a calm, soothing place to spend an evening and yet it is buzzing with activity. There is plenty to do. Take a walk along the calm waters, rent cycles with friends and family and go along the track, rent a speed boat and wizz through the marina waters, watch the beautiful skyline and/or choice from a variety of cafes and restaurants along the Marina. My attraction: Checking out the awesome yachts anchored along the Marina!
Not my kind of place. Not really my kind of place. I have been on quite a few boat trips, which mostly depart from here in the Marina. However, I don't really enjoy the bar there.

i love it most. my ultimate experience of Dubai happen at this place..i have been here form many time...sometimes for the Yacht trip and sometimes for the evening walk....the best place where you can rest....

Nice Atmosphere. I work for Xclusive Yachts and after a long day at work i either go to YOTS sports bar or Aquara Restaurant
Nice service and staff involved are also polite and curteous

Lunch with friends. Dropped in for lunch with friends and the restaurant was quiet on a very very hot day. We chose the buffet menu which afforded a soup starter as well as salad followed by a chicken dish then a main course of pizza or pasta and breads PLUS a light desert all for 90 aed. We were recommended to take the lemon tea as drinks which was also a good choice. We were quickly served and the food was okay, if anything we felt over fed! I chose a salmon pizza for a main course which wasn't great. My fault I was expecting cooked salmon not fresh and thickly sliced pieces. Friendly restaurant and nice for dining with friends. Good scenic situation although it was much too hot for sitting outside on this particularly day!

Perfect . I was attracted very much especially during the night when the lights reflect on water.U can see Many restaurants & cafes while walking around the marina. Safe and beautiful marina covered with very very tallll towers :)

Like sitting on a Cruise Ship in the Marine. If you are looking for a delightful setting right in the heart of the Marine area , this is the place . The brunch on a Friday evening is a treat , particularly if your into fish . I would wonder if the increase levy for the alcoholic beverage is value . The lounge chairs makes dining a delight , with panoramic views of below even though the outer deck is open therefore quite hot even in the evening.
Ladies night. Had a fantastic "ladies night" food and drink were lovely. Paid a one off payment on this special night and all food and drinks were included. Beautiful setting and well worth a visit.

Brunch under the stars . Visited last Friday for the brunch under the stars having booked via email before flying out. We wanted to experience a brunch but knew day time drinking would finish us off ! Cost about £65 each and is from 7-30-10-30. Was very unsure what to expect as were not fish lovers but I loved the venue! Couldn't find much info on the website so hoped for the best! Couldn't have gone betterArrived bang on time and had amazing service throughout . It's not an " all you can eat buffet " it's sever to you apart from a mezze table and outside bbq with chicken lamb and beefCourses kept coming and coming and we even tried an oyster ! Enough for us apart from fish and dessert was stunningDrinks non stop and a great selection!! Book! You won't be disappointed One tip- arrive at half 7- people turned up at 9!! Ended at half 10!
Breakfast with a view. Great breakfast, with proper ingredients for a good UK fry up, drinks to wash down that healthy option also
No manager around..... Very nice restaurant with great ambiance. The staff provides a very good service, always caringThere was no manager around.
Cruise Dinner Dubai Marina. We booked cruise dinner ride from Marina Yacht club, it was awsm experience. You can enjoy a walk around Dubai Marina after Cruise.
Wonderful view and structures. Don't miss this area in your trip to dubai.Tall and attractive constructions beside a part of sea and parked luxury yachts.
Great walk in the afternoon/evening. romantic atmosphere here... nice Walking by the marina and a lot of restaurants to choose between if hungry or thirsty

Wonderful way to spend a lazy evening!. How wonderful - the view of the sun going down over the marina, and watching the boats and people come and go beneath you. Great platter of food - not too pricey, and great service. Don't go for a formal dinner if you want to sit outside, but as a lovely way of spending an evening - highly recommended. As is the happy hour/s!!

Simply stunning. Beautiful location at the far end of the Marina. This is the perfect spot for what ever you want. They do an excellent (British style) breakfast with the contents being served in a hot frying pan (I found ideal on a hangover). Great place for lunch or dinner and in the evenings the Jazz/Piano bar was a firm favourite of mine.

Breakfast. Great location for Friday breakfast and where to go to enjoy a traditional British breakfast. Attentive, friendly staff, a cool menu and superb views of the Marina make this a great place to start your Friday.

Ladies Night. Lovely setting. Unfortunately no atmosphere at all as at any point during the evening there were more staff than customers. The canapés included were very poor and repetitive. Particularly uninspiring for the vegetarian in our group. Overall, disappointing.

Dubai marina. A great place to sit by the water watching million dollar yatchs and having some great food... it's a great place to get away from the hotel and have some food on the promenades defo good value for money. And if you feel flush enough then you could even look to hire a yatch and see how the other half live...
A must..... Dubai Marina by a yacht is a must but should be done towards the night, bargaining is possible......

Good Evening with Friends. Was invited by friend to join him for a meal and drink at the Yots Bar and to watch the Football 2016 competition on the wide screen. Had a really good evening in a nice atmosphere. Service outstanding as was the food and drinks all at a reasonable price. Would I use this bar again - Yes

Enchanting place to spend time. Dubai Marina Yatch Club is a very beautiful place .Surrounded by innovatively built ultra modern skyscrapers of various sizes and looks and restaurants, cafes of international brands/reputation this is a tourists paradise.Top brand hotel's ,business houses , offices and residential complexes adorn this place.People flock to this place to have lunch/dinner or to have coffee in coffee houses overlooking the spectacular yatch club.Heart is filled with joy at this cleanest, meticulously planned beautiful pleasure giving place.One can hire yatch to venture in to sea for a pleasure trip or to sail in the creek.Those who love walking , enough space is there in the restaurant-dotted spralling Marian. A thing of beauty is a joy for ever.Visitors keep on coming here to enjoy it's sheer mesmerising beauty and facilities gallor.Of course this is a very expensive place for budget tourists.It is connected by metro and trams.A must visit place.
Beautiful View. a good place for dinner, a bit expensive but the view compensate that extra bug. Both in the sunshine and after the sunset
marina. Very beautiful place for walking.especially at evening or night time.Great views for pictures.We been there few times

See Dubai in style. We were a group of friends, we found a really nice deal on Groupon and decided to rent a yacht for a 2 hours, you can bring your own alcohol along and even music. We actually saw Dubai in style and it was better any day than the regular sightseeing.

Glittering Lights & Beautiful Yachts. Dubai Yacht club at night is at it's best with Glittering Lights of all the beautiful buildings shimmering its reflection on the water and cool breeze flowing with Live Bands playing right beside you.

Wife's Birthday. My Wife and I had a drink in the Sports Bar within the Yacht Club and I had a peek upstairs and thought it would be a suitable location to celebrate her birthday (belatedly).We had no trouble booking on line and attended next evening (on Friday evening).On arrival we were presented with a menu and chose the full brunch with sparkling wine.The standard of the food was superb and plentiful, the service was excellent(not overbearing, but always on hand). Drinks were always refilled in timely fashion.Although it was not cheap it was very much worth it. The view over the marina is quite exceptional and most of all my wife was delighted with the evening, it was certainly memorable.I honestly have no bad points, it was a dining experience I would recommend in a heartbeat, great food, great service from excellent staff and beautiful surroundings. A fantastic evening, many thanks to the management and staff.

Mesmerising experience. We booked private Yacht for our family and friends about 20 people on May 19th 2016 for 2 hours. We had good time watching spectacular Dubai marina. After the good ride we felt we should have made booking for atleast 4 hours.

Cool Breeze, Arabian sea and view of Palm jumeirah. When Yacht sail towards Arabian Sea through canal/river surrounding the city of lights, it gives a great view. When it reaches sea a cool breeze and having dinner on yacht and View of Palm Jumeirah is awesome.

Take a yacht to make it memorable. We took a yacht for 1 hour and I must say it is just WOW. Yacht are luxurious and just sitting at the front and watching Dubai is worth the money. 700AED for big one and 400 for small one :)

Soooo much money. Lovely place to go and just wander around and look at the super expensive mega yacht. There are loads of restauraunts along the walk including Nandos. The path evenetually leads to the marina mall.
Casual Walk in the late afternoon. Lovely place just to stroll around in the late afternoon before dinner. Some amazing vessels and sights.
A gigantic mall with no soul. The artificial marina provides a small water plot, a few boats and plenty of sky scrapers. Accessing it is difficult and the rest is shops and restaurants.

Millions and Billions. Amazing view of the NEW DUBAI... Beautiful Yachts (Small to Big Size - All sizes). Recommend to take a Short tour on a yacht in the marina. You can avail the tour from this place. Starting from AED 150 per person.

Marina Dubai, visit May 2016.. We took a walk along the Marina, to get there we walked over a bridge that had the main road next to it. The bridge went over the marina, The Marina itself had a yacht club a pizza takeaway and a cafe with a small fountain outside. We had a drink at the takeaway, The chef was very polite and helpful. We had lunch at the cafe on the way to the yachut club. When we where having our cold diet cokes the chef told us the futuristic building in the distance was in fact the yachut club. But no yachuts next to it. On the way back to the bridge a dhow tour boat pulled in an docked, It had a silver Mermaid figurehead at the back and a large keel with a flower design on it at the front and the sides, I took a few photos of it.

Great view and atmosphere…surround by marvelous architectural work…!. Impressive surrounding at the famous Dubai Marina. You will experience a fascinating view of architectural wonders. Great service. A must to visit while in Dubai.
Interesting marina. Be sure to visit during the evening between late October and not later than April as it gets really hot and humid the rest of the time!

Great food in relaxed surroundings. West here for late lunch on Saturday. The staff were great. My son was given a free drink as his choice on the menu was not available. I had the fish and chips which was very well cooked and tasty. My son had the all day breakfast and he thoroughly enjoyed it. Special request of no salt was not a problem. Good food at a reasonable price in a great location.

Nice views and chilled out vibes. This place is nice for a date night with couples, friends or ladies night. My husband and I went on a Wednesday and availed of a 50aed prosecco deal which was amazing. We also got the surf and turf platter which was plenty for two. Views outside were lovely, comfy couches and chilled music.

Excellent. Thought we would give this a try as we got 20% discount it being sister of our hotel. Large restaurant seating inside or out but will only serve alcohol if you sit inside. I wasn't really expecting much the kitchen looked a little odd almost like a school cafeteria though the seating areas were nice it all just seemed a little bland. The staff were friendly and helpful. You could have knocked me over with a feather when my meal came I was shocked. The presentation was excellent and a fabulous steak sat on top of a mushroom with peppercorn sauce. 10 out of 10. Definitely come here again.

Friday Brunch is Great!. We went to the evening brunch....£75 a head but well worth it for the food quality and amount of drinks you can drink. Would go back as not only great food and service, but a night time view to be envied!
English Expat Express. This is gold digger central especially on Tuesdays. Pick up joint for young expats. If you're on the prowl, this is for you.
best place. best place to relaxxxx, best place to get together . you will definitely love the place when you experienced it .

Cool Cruise on Dubai Marina. The dinner cruise was excellent. From start to finish we felt special. The staff were very courteous. The cruise was smooth.The Marina Yacht Club promenade is a dream to walk with the night lights twinkling from the Dubai skyline.The only hitch was our tour operator did not provide a hotel pickup/drop so we had to go to the venue & return to our hotel on our own. As the cruise ends around 10 pm the thought of getting a cab might prey on the mind thus hindering wholesome enjoyment of the cruise.Thankfully we got a cab easily.
Great atmosphere. Note some really nice places to eat at night time and can get some really nice pictures of sky scrapers at night
GREAT BREAKFAST. The best breakfast menu for all tastes. I would recommend the menu but also the nice atmosphere where you can sit and enjoy the view of the Yacht Club.

Sunday Brunch. We have had quite a few brunches on this trip but this was far far the best. The views from the eating area along the creek and the city are second to none.The entertainment was first class for the kids, including disco, and what a band that played through the brunch.I have left the food till last because I have never had bad food were ever we have gone, But here well it was out of this world from the starters to the sweets.

Dubai Marina at Night. Wow, what a place, this is where all the fun happens, whether you are waiting to go on one of the Marina cruises, cycling around the marina, taking a stroll with friends or going out on the town. The Marina is certainly a must see, and the it is all centred around the Yacht club.

Nice venue but a bit uncomfortable to eat in the sports bar. This place was recommended for the sports bar so we decided to set of, watch a bit of sport while we had a bite to eat.The chairs were far too low or far too high to eat comfortably so we ended up in the restaurant part where the atmosphere was a bit dull.The food was ok but the steak that my husband had was a bit tough and the waiter didn't seem that bothered when we told him.Not a place I would rush back to even though the upstairs seemed to be buzzing. The view from the restaurant was limited-being right on the water you would have thought a nice view out would have been the main draw but windows were tinted with poor visibility.

Skyscrapers all around. It shloud b visted at night to enjoy the lights from all the skyscrapers with the artificial canal near you its a very nice view with hundreds of resturants on the sides u have to spend an evening there
at night or during the day. Very nice promenade to walk at night or during the day. Lots of restaurants, stunning views of boats and tall buildings.
Amazing night walk. Just the perfect place to spend an evening with great views of million lights in the marina! Its a very beautiful walk with lots of bars and restaurants to experience real Dubai,

Nice area - lovely views with lots of skyscrapers. Really nice area to walk around. Our hotel was close by and we could explore this area full of sky scrapers, boats and walking alleys while enjoying some nice sushi in the restaurant by the Spinneys/Royal Orchid on the Marina Walk.

Brilliant Brunch. Went with friends for Friday brunch, truly a fantastic venue, brilliant staff led in our case by Harvey ( Can't pronounce his Romanian name) but an absolute class act, who was an exemplary brand ambassador. His attention, friendliness and service ethos was exceptional, I would recruit him as my front of house straight away. The brunch was incredibly great value with sumptuous food and alcohol that did not cease. The chef Mark came out, made a fuss of our vegan and delivered a super vegan lasagne, with fresh vegetables and humous to start finished by a fruit platter that was perfect. Exceptional all round.

Ladies night - ideal for prosecco fan. Was expecting another pricey bar but was so happy to discover ladies night. Aka prosecco for £10 (per bottle) which was much needed after a rip off dinner elsewhere. Nice venue and views of the marina (obviously). Would suggest getting there before sundown to enjoy the yachts.
Amazing. Sweet view, lovely weather, nice Yachts. Recommended between 6-8PM to enjoy the skylines and canal view. Nightlife there is so nice and full full of restaurants and coffees

Great bar. Great bar in a lovely location. It's a beautiful part of Dubai and well worth the visit. Drinks and staff were great... a real hangout for expats and if you're into boats (I'm not) you'll love it even more.

Yacht ride around the Palm Beach. Can book a yacht for 2000 AED , cold drinks and food stuff comes with it ... It was cool . The trip was in Spetmber 2015 so the weather was acceptable. Nice view of the Dubai city from the sea.
Stylish Bar...Great Setting. Very stylish bar, in a great setting.Décor chic, and clean cut. Have a happy hour where drinks are 10AED...so worth a visit.Could spend all evening in this place !!
Very original solution. Very original solution - a marina with beautiful boats and round towers and restaurants.Cool place for evening entertainment.
my lovely memory. I loved it once i first spotted it. maybe i was myself overexcited with my first visit to dubai also, but i remember this place as a must to visit in Dubai.
Amazing!. Amazing view, great food, a lot of large smoking terraces with lounges, if you want to have a Blade runner type of view in Dubai, this is a must see.
A must see. Excellent ! An understatement still.. A total must visit.. It is Architecturally stunning clubhouse with exclusive bars, restaurants and lounges on a man-made canal.
Loved it. Beautiful setting with an impressive view! Drinks are perfect, crowd is great, service could be faster but overall it's a lovely place for happy hour or dinner. You won't regret visiting!
Awesome view. The Dubai Marina Yatch club is simple mesmerizing. The view of the marina walk is breathtaking. A must visit once atleast.
Good Architecture. The place is great and the architecture is like adream. I really like the place. But if you don't like the high buildings, probably you won't like the place too.

Breakfast at the Marina. The café overlooking the marina provides both inside and outside tables - go for the outside ones if you can.
The all day breakfast is really good and includes pork sausage and real bacon for a really good price - this place is a hidden gem

Seeing Dubai fron the water. Spent a great afternoon out on a medium size hire boat - comfortable for 15 plus crew - cruising down the creek from the Marina and back over 3 hrs. Evening trips available as well.Just pick your day well as ours coincided with a power boat race which stopped us going out round the palm and back but great time nonetheless.

Interesting and a well designed water way. Quite an amount of time we spent here. Its very close to western country life style here. Maintained really well it has very good view around the bay. Nice restaurants too around them. You can avail nice boat rides here.
Great place. Lovely views of the marina and the walk , I would advice to get there early or reserve a table it gets very busy on happy hour .

Must visit during night. Dubai Marina is a place to be visited during night. It is very hot during the day. There are lots of cafes and you can take a leisure walk in Dubai Marina. There are certain yacht available for rent that takes you around Burj al arab and Atlantis.

Great Location. Plenty of places to eat though some a bit pricey with happy hours at some so check out before as you have to book. But views are great evening walks around the area are tranquil & you can forget the time (walked for 2 hours before having to get a taxi back to the hotel at a £15 cost)
Nice and relax. After working around the marina it good to cooling down with good cocktail and some snack here, good music and a great to watching other people around.
Beautiful place. We went on a dinner cruise that left from the Yacht Club..Beautiful place...very nice boats and yachts there to see
Stunning Views. Loved every minute of Tuesdays ladies night, gorgeous young faces, light music with a live DJ, great atmosphere.

Best breakfast in town!. The breakfast here is phenomenal.
Served in a large wok / frying pan, the food is always delicious, service is great, location is perfect.
You can't go wrong if you want a full cooked brekky!
Good food, excellent setting.. Perfect for a romantic dinner or a business meeting. The food is delicious and it comes with high caliber service.
alright. was okay. nothing extraordinary though. decent food,clean,calm, professional staff, and varied activities.

Good place for drinks and marina view. good place to chill out with friends, their food are also good, so I would definitely recommend this place for a visit, it's close to other bars and restaurants too, so if you want to do a bar hop, you can easily do it from this place.

A great walk between yachting and skyscrapers. nice restaurants, two children playgrounds, a fine place to take a walk. Unfortunately, restrooms are few and far, shared between all the Restaurants. The acquatic fountain with water sounds and lights is amazing.
Good place for a drink. This has a good vantage point in the marina and is a fun place to meet friends for a drink or even a meal whilst taking in the sights and sounds of the marina.

Great place to relax for an hour or so.. We used to come here or dinner but they have changed their format to drinks and grazing food rather than a formal meal. Still a wonderful place to sit but for a different reason now.
The views are fantastic, the music loud and the furniture very laid back and comfortable.
Evening meal on boat . Me and my wife went on a evening meal at the Dubai marina. The experience was amazing and so was the Buffett meal. I would highly recommend to visit.

A gem hidden in the Marina area. Every time I visit Dubai especially if I am staying in a hotel in the Marina area I visit the Marina Yacht Club for either breakfast or lunch, the quality of both is excellent served indoors or outside in the wonderful surroundings of the Marina area. The indoor restaurant is of a medium size but spacious with plenty of seating outside, there is also an excellent sports bar showing a variety of sports.
Great place. Go on the cruise!. I would highly recommend booking a cruise with dinner from the Dubai marina yacht club. It was an amazing experience, we have some great photos. You won't regret it!
Stunning place. Wow the views over the marina are beautiful the yacht club is very nice, very plush just sitting overlooking the marina well worth a few drinks just for the views.
Lovely evening walk and rollerblade. We kept returning here in the evenings to walk or roller skate off our dinner! there are many restaurants and there is also a shopping mall.

What a view!. Great place with great viewWe checked with a few regulars and visited with my sisters dogThis place has fantastic outdoors and pet friendly on FridaysTotally loved the breeze in my face with good beer, good food and good company There is something about a freely roaming furry friend with wind in his face... Its so relaxing

Nice Hangout.... If you got a couple of hours to spend..and weather is good..better go visit there..very nice views..on the water..you can also enjoy a dinner there..food ok, design goes with the name..nice for solo,friends and even family

Wonderful. Dubai Marina its a beautiful place to walk, you can find many restaurants with local and intenational food.Nando's was a really good restaurant, good spicy food.It's really near to the Marina metro station
great outdoors next to beach. i visited it again today at their Lebanese restaurant,it was quite busy outside. service was okay, food was good and the outdoor settings were perfect.
Great atmosphere! cool place on Lady's night!. Is a cool place right in front of the marina! few restaurnats, good for breackfast, drinks, or ladies night! advise!

Cool hang out. This is a pretty cool place to hang out! There is a cool mocktail bar on the upper deck and on the Marina level a lovely restaurant and sports bar. The menu is good and caters for all - what was surprising was the relatively good value considering it's trendy location. Check it out while in Dubai
Aesome!!. Take a boat tour of the Palm islands and the Marina. Never pay asking price. They change by the hour, not for how many people, so find some people to go with and the cost it split.
Happy Hour. Love the yacht club happy hour most drinks now 25aed & special deals at 11pm, cool beats & great views!

Amazing views. We went there after a boat trip over the weekend. It was Thursday night and there was a deal on drinks in the bar. The views are amazing and there is music playing in the background. Should go if visiting Dubai
Nice for a drink. Stopped here for a drink it's right by the marina mall one of the smaller shopping malls and the ferry outside takes you across to the other side of the marina

Day visit. As a member of 3 Australian boating clubs it was a must to visit the Dubai Marina. A little disappointed at the atmosphere, but we must accept we not at our own club. Lovely venue but a unfortunate we could not see all of the facilities.
Pretty Place But Bad crowd. The yacht Club is a nice place and beautiful view, however the crowd that comes is not all that great. We had experienced very cheap crowd.
Nice walk to do in family.. Lots of restaurants and the Marina Mall make it fun for the whole family. Beautiful surroundings, nice at night with all the lights.

Dubai Marina Yacht Club. We didn't visit the place specifically but did see the beauty of this place while doing the Marina Dhow Cruise. The place is beautiful during the evening hours as all the building are lighten by then and it gives a different prospective while cruising through.

A place to try in Dubai Marina. This is a very nice restaurant for any occasion, with friends or family. The location is also very nice (we were sitting outside) and the food is really delicious. I ordered shrimp with polenta and my boyfriend fish and chips. Both were prepared in an original way and were very tasty. We'll be back!

Very Good. We had the lovely Saturday roast buffet and i couldn't fault it all. As much tasty meat and veg as you'd like, friendly helpful staff, very delicious food, and lovely views. We've been twice and quite frankly I'd go every Saturday night if I could persuade my husband, who just likes my cooking. But really excellent food and value for money.

Excellent place for anyone to visit. Nice, clean and very relaxing.. The Marina is a place for all ages. Plenty of restaurants to choose from and the place is spectacular. You also see the new with the old so you can compare how Dubai is changing. If going to Dubai you must visit this place.

nice place to meet friends. The club offers a couple of outlets. The outdoor cafe is nice and relaxing to enjoy an ice cream or a good cappuccino and watch the Marina.
The modern pub has a nice atmosphere to share drinks with fiends

Central meeting point for a gathering on the Marina. The restaurants are of good quality though the wine list is not at the level and should be improved. Good ladies night atmosphere (don't drink their cheap wine however if you have a senstive stomach), but it is a mixed enjoyable crowd. Good enough to be an be an after work for business travellers.A good restaurant for lunch downstairs, where you can enjoy a great duck risotto.The sports pub is a casual good place for a beer with a mate when you don't want to leave your week-end style and flip flops...

Nice View. Marina yacht club is one of the beautiful place in Dubai to visit and most importunately the surrounding view is absolutely stunning , full with skyscrapers. One of the few places in Dubai where it is a joy to just walk, have a coffee or dinner, enjoy shisha and relax.

Ladies Night. We went here for ladies night one night! Really good night, we had 4 free drinks each. The music was really good and standing out on the terrace is lovely because you are directly in the Marina!
Stunning place but.... it is not all glitters, look out for nearby streets. not so glamorous. Alfresco dining, stroll along the river. a nice place to see when in Dubai especially during evenings
Breathtaking Views. Hired a private cruise. Cruised in the sea for 2 hours. Amazing this was. Just dont miss this when you are in Dubai
Nice place for an evening walk and dinner. One of the few places in Dubai where it is a joy to just walk, have a coffee or dinner, enjoy shisha and relax.

A Place You Must Go. This place is accessible and if you are just for passing time, you can go here. If you feel like you want to go to a mall, there is one nearby. This is one beautiful place while watching different kind of boats. Surely you will enjoy coming here.
Nice place to visit. You will find the marina on the way to the palm it's worth a visit as the tram stops there. Plenty of restaurants and places to drink.

Tuesday ladies night a must. Great night Tuesday night is ladies night 3 free drinks staff are friendly comfy seats but a veiw to die for food is good with lots of snacks to chose very comfortable u could go on your own soon make friends
Excellent. Marina yacht club is one of the beautiful place in Dubai to visit and most importunately the surrounding view is absolutely stunning.
Enjoyable. Great place to visit during the day or the evening, it depends on the kind of atmosphere you want. Fab views looking out onto the yachts, and it's great for a stroll
Nice place to watch sports. I wouldnt say this is much of a yacht club, but it has nice views of the marina and great restaurants to watch sports.
Fancy Place. Nice view there to the Skyline of Dubai Marina, many (bad) restaurants and bars. Nice to walk through and watch the rich and wannabe rich people.

Nice time spending in evening. Good place for enjoying evening and night time on the boat/yacht. City looks very beautiful in night as they are illuminated with designer light in the night. They take tours of whole Marina in 1-2 hours and provide nice dinner as well as Tanura dance.
Marina is cool. there are so many hotels and restaurants around the marina, it is great for an evening stroll and sit outside the cafes for a drink or dinner. we loved it!

Saturday Buffet is Ecellent. I come for the Saturday buffet regularly, the selection is limited and always the same but there are very good roasts of beef, lamb, pork and chicken and they are delicious! The veg selection and starch selection is always top notch too. It's not terribly cheap but it's worth it. The atmosphere is lovely overlooking the marina and the ambiance is nice with mellow music. Prepare to get stuffed as it's irresistible.

Beautiful Marina. I visited the Marina in February. Very easy to get around, lovely walk along the Marina. Lots of restaurants to enjoy. I had lunch by the Marina, it was reasonable, service was very good.

smoke free and friendly. Great place to watch sport and unwind. Friendly staff and good bar snacks. the sports bar on the ground floor has plenty of screens showing premiership football and other sports. The non smoking policy makes a pleasant change from most of the other Dubai bars.

Sea Shells on the Sea Shore - Deep Blue Sea. My First Visit to The Yacht Club was in June 2014 , A Few Days Before Starting of Holy Month of Ramadan, Enjoyed to the Max at This place, Had Good Lunch (Duck, Fish & Chips, Singaporean Noodles) with Some Non Alcoholic Drinks Amongst Office Colleagues and one of the Best People from Work. Our Deep Sea Diving or Swimming was a Memory Never to Be Forgotten Ever in my entire life and my colleagues Pushing me in side the Deep Blue Sea.Amazing Place with Good Ambiance and Different Variety of Intercontinental Food Available, As a Yacht Club located in Dubai marina, A Passage way to Enter the Arabian Sea to Enjoy Fishing and Diving in the Sea...Along with a Load of Activities Related to Water Sports as Most Commonly European's and Americans are Seen at these Places and Dubai Locals, Most Likely Place to be Enjoyed with Family and Friends, Good place for Business Meets, Lot and Lots of Variety of Food and Drinks Available to Enjoy... Will Surely Visit this Place Again
Nice Place. Liked the place. Was a bit pricey for dinner but its worth it. I would recommend checking on what type of activities they are hosting, before showing up. Overall it a 5 star yacht club.

Elegance leading to a marina full of lavish yachts. Passed through here a number of times with friends when going on yacht for the day, it really does look the part and gives that lavish luxury feel especially when you walk out and Onto your yacht.
Dinner area. The Dubai Marina is the ideal location for evening dinnerand nice walk, you find all kind of restaurants at all price around the harbour area.
Marina Marina. Cool activity. Very friendly people. And if weather is favorable, one can take a yacht ride and enjoy dubai skyline from sea.

Night to remember. Our trip was delayed because of sudden changes made by our company, still xclusive yacht accommodate us and give us a great services. from boarding, cruising till the end of the cruise, they gave a good service, proud to say that the captain and crew are Pinoys, very welcoming! (I'm not being biased here, :D) overall, it was a good experience after all the delays that we've been through. Kudos to xclusive yachts! :D
Wow. 4 of us were walking around the marina and decided to try the food at the Yacht Club. We had the best ribs ever. This restaurant sells alcohol.

Quiet Biking and jogging round in the morning. This place is nearly empty in the morning. Few residents come down for a jog or bike (there are rent-a-bikes around the area). It's a pretty quiet place if you want some me time.

One of the nicest place to take a walk in Dubai. We traveled as a couple in January 2016.We visited Marina on a morning and we took a nice walk along. The Skyscrapers and the yachts resting on the shore make an unforgettable image. There were no crowd around so you can enjoy some peaceful time alone.
Lavish spread. We had the buffet, which was awesome. There was an abundance of seafood, gorgeous salads and deserts. The setting is magical.

Ladies night - wow. Tuesday night is ladies night. Apart from the fabulous views of the Marina at night, the views inside are pretty good too. Very busy as expected and difficult to get a seat / table. But the view from the outside balcony at night keeps bringing us back here year after year

Hardly a Yacht Club except by name! Just a commercialised idea of one with a parking lot for under used over priced boat. Its actually a place that contains some bars & restaurants and trades under the title of "Yacht Club" do not be confused with this.

Great business conference/seminars venue. With very flexible ample and well organised spaces, with good catering facilities, services and great view on Marina Bay area, this venue contributed to our function success.

Marina Yacht Club. This place is nice to go visit, its has several restaurant and cafes besides the dock. The view is covered by a lot of buildings , several of them that have a nice architecture. Its sort of a must to go visit if you are in Dubai.

Lovely place to eat and watch the passers by on the Marina. We love this place for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Just go there, pick a restaurant and enjoy nice food, drinks & watching the Boats and People pass by on a lazy morning.

Must see in Dubai. Some tours may not cover this place - take a cab yourself in the evening take a long walk and after you are hungry take a seat on any of the food joints or fine dinning place spread around the yacht club. I don't remember the place where I had dinner in the center of the semicircular food court somewhere - the place was slightly overpriced but was still a value for money. If you are lucky you may find the same place.

Business Event. An event for 60 people in a private area with a marina balcony terrace and bar. Absolutely excellent, staff could.not be more helpful lead by Jessica. The food was outstanding and enjoyed by all. Would highly recommend.
Amazing!!!. Amazing place!!! Very nice buildings, marinas, cafes, restaurants!!! Very modern place, suitable for fun!!

magical. The place is a convoluted network of canals and walkways (promenade) where you can stroll or sit in one of the many cafes and restaurants which have indoor or better outdoor seating.you can rent a yacht or a speed boat for a trip to the sea and palm island and the best time to do that is just before sunset

Ladies night. It was Happy Hour 6-730 then Ladies Night on a Tuesday (3 free drinks for girls) so all in all a reasonable evening. The view outside is outstanding! We got there just as the sun went down and watching all the expensive yachts come and go whilst overlooking the twinkly sky scrapers of Dubai really was special. Most people here seemed to be British ex pats which was fine. Service was excellent and the tunes were brilliant and really set the vibe. Shame we don't have time to come back!

Tad Racist?. Booked a yacht for a graduation party with a few friends. Decided to check out the club and was faced with utter rudeness as soon as we entered. Just because we weren't white?? Seemed so. Disgusted at this place and it's behavior to non-whites. Next time please put up a sign board saying Whites Only.
Amazing place. Visited The boat show, amazing place, you must have some drinks, fantastic atmosphere, must be visited at night & also during the day.
Dubai Marina over night. The Dubai Marina is amazing - I'd suggest you to visit it both day and night, but if you need to choose definitely night tours are breathtaking
A must for some drinks!. What a great place to hang out for some cocktails! they are overpriced but compensated for the fantastic atmosphere!

Where some of the rich keep there boats. You can have a great walk around the marina and there are plenty of places to stop and just look. Pleanty of places to have food and a drink.Take a hat as it was very hot when we went.

They have everything you could possibly want. You could go to any restaurant you want along the Marina, you could rent any size boat, jetskis, go out on a catamaran ride....just anything you could think of, they offer it,
Very relaxing. The Dubai Marina Yacht Club is an ideal place to relax and enjoy a drink whilst overlooking the marina. You can usually get a table on the balcony and the service is excellent.

A good area to visit. The Dubai Marina is a good area for tourists. Nice walking routes, lots of places to eat and a wide variety of boat tours on the marina and out towards the Palm.Easy to get to from the Metro.
DINING CLOSE THE YACHTS AT DDUBAI MARINA!!!!. A fantastic view of luxury yachts at Dubai Marina! The iconic terrace delivers a beautiful view to enjoy a excellent dinner! This place is a must to go!
Nice place to visit. A relaxing place full of sights,places to see and to spent a lot of time doing what ever you like especially in the evening
Sundowners. Had sunflowers and snacks before an evening out. Excellent atmosphere,very popular.q uhh if I service, fair prices.

Disappointed. I used to go to the Dubai Marina Yacht club sports bar often to watch EPL and International rugby matches but when I returned after an enforced break to see the 6 nations rugby, I was not at all impressed by the refurbishment. The designer has created a less than average environment which is no longer comfortable. On top of that the staff advised me that they would no longer be screening the 6 nations matches. i phoned in during the following week to check that there may have been a mistake and the person I spoke to confirmed that they are no longer screening rugby. Needless to say I now go elsewhere
Running. Nice place to come from downtown by metro and have a really nice 8 km round run, maybe with some coffee stop :) Nice part of Dubai, maybe in the evening with more people and night life.
Great experience to have a business meeting on cruise. Had a great experience of conducting a business meeting on cruise. Excellent ambiance, good food and great service. Two thumbs up
More for locals. Still a good spot for ladies night on Tuesday, can be a little packed but it's always a fun night to meet people
Fancy and nice. Loved our visit to take a yacht a couple of weeks ago. the amenities are fancy and luxurious, the yachts are many and all amazing. looking forward to the next trip
Prince for a day. We booked a luxurious yacht for ourselves. Felt like a prince. We went around in water for an hour or so and saw almost entire Dubai connected to the seas.
TOP!. If you like to eat for lunch or dinner inside a really exclusive site go there! Nice food, nice people nice ladies! all at the top! But it is quite expensive! Enjoy!
A favorite in the marina . A very nice to place to enjoy a few drinks at with great service. Outdoors so bring a sweater if you're going during the winter.
Just take a day to walk the whole area.. We went early before it got real warm and walked this whole area for 6 hours. Well worth it with many things to see and plenty of restaurants.

An Experience. A yacht club and marina in the heart of downtown Dubai. In fact the Marina, as it is popularly referred to, is the heart of Dubai. Probably the only marina in the world surrounded by skyscrapers and connected to the sea through a narrow channel. An engineering marvel

Luxury and Modernity and Shopping in one go.... Built as a centre point of Emaar’s Dubai Marina development, Dubai Marina Yacht Club (DMYC) is set in the heart of new Dubai and has rapidly gained a reputation as one of the most popular private yacht clubs in the region.The purpose-built clubhouse forms the centrepiece of four distinctive marinas. Set along the length of a remarkable 3.5km canal, the marinas provide sheltered berthing for over 500 yachts in an unrivalled setting.Make sure you take the water transport run by RTA at Marina which approximately cost some small amount of money and get a good ride and see Dubai's skyline from water. Night ride has its own charm, please note this service closes by around 7pm or 8pm.
super. the dubai marina yacht club is one of the prestigious places to visit in dubai. it comes with dining & drinks with an amazing view of dubai marina skyline. have visited many times.
Beautiful place surrounded by skyscrapers and yatchs. Love this place , very beautiful location surrounded by skyscrapers and beautiful catamarans , side walk is also very nice .

Hello. I am really grateful to the team for creating the warmest atmosphere for charming smiles and alive guest care. I am coming to Dubai Marina Yacht Club almost every evening and planning keep doing that. Helen is the loveliest one, Bala is a really person of service, Joel, Deny and Nitesh made the place for me memorable. Thank you guys. EA. +79065251703+971529384382.

amazing location. amazing location that give you the entire dubai marina landmark .. with all variaty of boats. we spend most of our weekend over that with friends specially to rent the fishing boat ..you should try .

Best place in Dubai for a drink. Wow!!! Got a table outside and sat with my wife on our honeymoon and I really was blown away by the skyline, and then over the balcony multi million pound yachts docked up! What a setting! Beer is good service is fantastic and the price is great Tuesday's are ladies drink for free! A must see if visiting Dubai

Best place in Dubai. I go here several times most weeks. The staff are fantastic and the GM Jimmy goes out of his way to provide top quality service. Don't miss Ladies Night on a Tuesday with cheap drinks and wonderful views over the Marina. Fantastic place both day and night.

WOW!. fabulous venue with superb sunset views over Dubai skylineMet as a family group and enjoyed amazing meal and great service, enjoyed main and desert with drinks, little expensive but the view and atmosphere was worth it
Relaxing, good views and great food.. Had a lunch meal here. All very tasty (although a little pricey). Great views of the city in the distance. The boardwalk is always a great place to eat from.
Mesmerizing. One of the must see and visit locations in Dubai. The scenary and the service are great. The tranquility is much enjoyed.

Majestic view from marina cruise. I visited marina cruise and felt it was awesome as it went slowly between all the high rise buildings giving a feel of dubai . The only drawback is food, however it was told that it is better than dhow cruise so i preferred marina bit still food was OK as there were limited options for vegetarians.But overall the fun and feel made it one of the memorable time spent in dubai.Must experience!!

Nice place, food is ok. Loved this place, it's a trendy venue, beautifully designed and luxurious. Food was wonderfully presented, but not cooked fantastically. The scallops were rubbery and the appetizers were ok.
Marina Yacht Club. Had a very nice time upstairs and a good time at the downstairs pub. Just drinks but good scene with comfy outside sofas, good service.

Nice view over Dubai marina. Great dinner buffet and service. We spent an evening with family and friends at the Restaurant. Nice buffet. Eccellent roast beef. Pleasant atmosphere. Attentive service. Really recommandable.
Love the views. Love going for a bite round here as the views are just amazing! We even took a boat ride during the evening which was fairly cheap and for 1-2hours long...well worth it!

Always nice and busy, great for something fizzy.. We head down to DMYC for a few drinks before heading to a club or late-night bar. It is perfectly situated in the Marina with easy access to surrounding restaurants and bars. The food there is good, the tapas-style bar snacks are great and there is always a great atmosphere with a youthful, lively but respectful crowd.

Stunning Views. This remains on our top list whenever we have visitors. The views from the water, of the Burj Al Arab and Atlantis and the shoreline and the magnificent architecture of the new buildings, are incomparable.
Great Views. Great views, food is good and there is a happy hour most week nights. I take all my visitors to Dubai there. Ladies night is also worth a visit for.

Merrily , Merrily .....life is but a dream.. The night cruise with dinner on board was a relaxing experience. The skyscrapers and the lights of the city reflected on the water - scenic. The on-board entertainment added a cuteness quotient. The music could have been played a few keys lower, or may be turned off altogether - a bit jarring at times.
Amazing area. This is a stunning area with great buildings all around, nice restaurants and beautiful yactsNice to do walking or jogging with excellent views

Marvellous Marina !!!. Wonderful place to spend some quality time with family and friends, went there on 04th Feb 2016 and stunned by it's sheer beauty, the whole area greets us with tall sky scrapers located around a waterfront, enjoyed a lot and took some fabulous photos and videos to cherish.Must visit for all age groups when we are in Dubai , food quality and taste was top class.
amazing place. This is a lovely place to walk around, with its skyscrapers in every direction. Lovely waterways to walk along.
Amazing!. We had hired a 54ft Yacht for the day, whilst waiting, we had a lovely mocktail, then a glass of champagne. Service is very good, very clean and a great place to have a meal/drink.
A great find. We visited the club with local friends who introduced us to the Yacht Club for dinner. Excellent facilities and menu choices and, on the whole, good value.

Fantastic group meal on the balcony. First visit to the Yacht Club for a group meal. Fantastic location with wonderfully friendly staff. The food was excellent and the atmosphere very relaxed as sat outside in the afternoon for lunch and drinks. Good have spent all evening here too as it is was so chilled - will definitely be back, only wish it could be sooner!

Evening with the girls & also with husband & friends. Have been a couple of times there is a happy few hours for ladies but the drinks rant to expensive but the view from the terrace in the evening is amazing
Dubai Marina. Fantastic area for living and shopping in JB Residences. Enjoyed the time there and rented a yacht with guests and cruised along to Burj Al Arab Hotel. Can highly recommend.

Breakfast . This was the best breakfast I've eaten in Dubai to be honest.Great service and our breakfast tasted so fresh and delicious. Really well presented food.Lovely place to sit and chill before starting a day of manic sightseeing or shopping.Loved it

lovely breakfast. if you're in the marina head for the full English served in a skillet, great value and very tasty, well worth a visit. Only down point is that you can't sit outside in the café/bistro that serves the breakfast
Don't miss!!!. Exact place to rent yacht for team outing or romantic cruise for couples. Never disappointed. Staff is very attentive and understandable.
lovely. great area to have a nice walkplenty of bars cafes etcrelaxing place to come and chillalthough probably busy in the evening
Fantastic View!. Perfect place for night out with friends. The view is really fascinating.only drawback is the lack of chairs for tall tables.

Expensive and neglected. We entered the restaurant and there was no one for the welcoming, escorting and seating. We ended up finding someone after a while but the whole ambiance of the place left us wondering what is going on.The place was empty, only one table had guests at the terrace and the smell from the kitchen was all over the place.We got some water while checking for the menu. The wine list was awful. Super expensive prices for cheap, garbage-y wines. The food menu was even worse. We decided to leave and not our money in such a neglected overpriced restaurant

great ladies night. great view from the marina and always packed on Tuesday's for lady's night. the weekends it gets a little packed, but that is to be expected. it's a great place to go with a group of people!
eve walk by the side !. a nice place to walk by the side of the creek at the mariina. The place is lighted well and soothing to be surrounded by high rises.
Amazing View. If you are looking for a perfect place with a luxury view -- visit this place. Food are excellent service is great and the music is just perfect to chill.
luxury time. It was lovely to walk and stroll around the Marina Yacht Club.To see many luxurious boats and the warm breeze of sunshine enhance the place and make one's feel at home.
Amazing during late evenings. The Dubai Marina Yacht Club has one of the best Evenings in Dubai. Full of Lights, the Lights of Superb Buildings Shining on the Marina Water is really delightful.

Tranquill. Dubai marina is well worth a visit to see the impressive structures and building that surround it. Take a trip on the marina in one the the various boats on offer you'll not be disappointed.
Night Life. we can get the best view only after sunset and with dubais city Lights. we can walk around yacht club for 30 min and enjoy the city lights

Fantastic Dining and View. I booked a tour of yacht in marina Dubai and it was very awesome. The dinner in the yacht with amazing view of new Dubai, beautiful night lights and cool wind was enough to enjoy alone. It was peaceful and calm. It was soothing to see the water and the reflection of lights in the water. High rises of new Dubai were glamorous. Must ride the yacht if you visit Dubai. It was 2 hour tour with pick and drop from and back to the hotel.
Beautiful at night!. If you are visiting Dubai a stop here is a must. Absolutely recommended during the night...nice to come here for a dinner of just for a drink. The view is breathtaking!

Fantastic experience. Worth every penny. Went in a three-hour trip on a yacht with some friends. What a great way to see Dubai shoreline and watch the sunset.Only comment is that paying 50 AED for valet after already paying 1000s doesn't sound right.Be prepared for the fun with food, drinks, flip flops, music and swim suit. If the weather allows for it, you might get e chance to jump into the water at some point!Marine police are friendly and they keep going around to ensure everyone is safe, so don't be alarmed if you see them approaching the yacht.
Great food and wonderful view....again!. Had a great meal and drinks here whilst on holiday in Dubai. Great staff & food. A must visit if you are staying on or near the Marina.
Breakfast in a frying pan. Full breakfast only just fits into a prying pan which is how it is served. The weekly brunch is good value as is the happy hour in YOTS sports bar.

The Best Breakfast!. This place does the best all day breakfast in the Emirates! I comes in a frying pan and its perfection, the other meals were also excellently cooked and again very fresh. There is also a "bar" which we popped into for a pint and the staff were very attentive.
Must visit. Fancy place with a beautiful crowd, great DJ and absolutely stunning view. Great for ladies night out or party with visitors
great night out. Thursday nights and ladies nights are great here. I have never eaten at the Yacht club but I hear the food is good also. Worth a look if you are on holiday.

Nice place in Marina. The Yatch club is a nice place to meet up with friends if you live around the marina area. They play live music some evenings and the food is delicious. I have tried their steak and creme brûlée and they were spot on!I After your dinner or drinks you can talk a walk on the beautiful Marina walk!

Quiet. Was told this place is buzzing. Went there on Xmas eve but the place was dead. Hardly anyone there. We sat for a few mins and then we walked out and headed back to the other pub close by. No, server was bothered to even attend to us as they looked like they wanted to wind up.

A Place with A view. We passed the place several times while walking in the Marina and the place is so beautiful from outside. Went in for a drink. A very elegant and grand place. The view of the marina and the sea beyond is breathtaking at night with the towers lighted up around. You can see the landmarks and the boats passing by in the Marina which are also lighted as are the trees. Such a lovely sight. Worth a visit even if some might consider it a bit pricey.

Where is the service gone?. I have been having lunches at the Yacht Club since it exists. Always been very happy. Not sure what happened this time, but service what terrible, food took ages to arrive, and quality was not as it used to be. Wake up, management!
awesome. this is our first visit in Dubai we were went so many place this is one of the best what a nice such a reach feeling will visit again
good view. good view, great walk around the waterfront. elegant atmosphere. visited only by outside, not possible to write about the interior

Quick drink. Decided to have a walk around Dubai Marina and popped in here for a quick drink as it was very hot. Can't comment on the food but I would say that judging by the menu, this would be a great place for an evening. Fantastic views and very friendly service.

Beautiful. Very beautiful and colorful at night. If you are into photography, you should not miss this spot. It becomes very lively in the evenings as people come out to jog, take a stroll, eat snacks, smoke shisha.

Good times with great company and Shisha. We went to he Dubai Marina and Yacht Club in the evening time around 9PM. There was an outdoors area near the water that the locals as well as expats and travelers were hanging out and just having some Shisha with drinks. The view was nice as you are sitting out in the open near the water and having a drink with a little shisha. Everyone around was minding their own business just having a pleasant conversation with their friends. The music wasn't too loud to disturb everyone from hearing each other and it was just a nice classy night with whomever you choose to shisha with. Prices were great, it was not too expensive at all.

Lovely way to spend the evening. Maybe it was because the weekend was ending, but we saw not many people there. That was perfect as we got a great seat from where we could see the Skyline and the yachts below. The food was also reasonably priced.
very beautiful. One of the quietest and most beautiful places in Dubai and can easily rest and exercise, and enjoy the sun
awesome experince. we had 3 hours cruise on the small yacht. The experience was awesome. The refreshment was only soft drinks, apart from that everything went well.
Lovely spot!. We loved it here! Strolled about got some lunch and took some great photos. Did a lot of dreaming about owning boats too!
A nice place to have a drink with marina views. The yacht club wasn't busy so we could have a nice relaxing drink outside with views across the marina whilst listening to the DJ's music.

Nice atmosphere and good restaurant . Dubai Marina has a very nice atmosphere and can recommend this place for a nice evening walk. But don't expect too much of it. It is really a nice area with water and boats and a nice boulevard with some restaurants, but also not that many. It is worth visiting at the evening hours for a relaxing walk or dinner.
Great views!. Really fun and cool party vibe, staff really pleasant. little bit of a wait for drinks but views spectacular.

Yachty Breakfast. The Yacht Club is the heart of the Dubai Marina, from the busy ladies night to a quiet breakfast it delivers a modern contemporary marina feel. The staff are friendly and the atmosphere is relaxed. Non members will feel as welcome there as salty sea dogs and if you like looking at nice boats, while partaking of refreshment, then its a must place to stop for a drink, and yes it serves the full range of sinful delights, from pork to bourbon and back!
New buildings, new boats. There are still a lot of buildingconstructions on going. It Seems never ending. But anyhow the area is nice to visit, looking overall the nice ships.
Enjoy the fine dining with them which is just near my home. This is wonderful place with good view as well. Relaxing even with baby. They are friendly and good service as well.

sail away. we hired a private yacht so that we can get real close to the Burj al Arab and the views were stunning it was amazing to see the beauty when the sun was shining but even more breathtaking when the sun was setting or even when it got dark and seeing all the buildings and trees light up. it was really peaceful and i would recommend this to anyone

Nice spot for a drink. Really lovely views from here of the marina. I went on a Ladies Night once and it was very busy so probably best avoid going on a Tuesday if you want to be able to sit out and enjoy the views!

Great place for a cocktail and relax. Great views across the marina and looking at the boats , Yacht,s , fantastic cocktails at 241 in the evening . Been twice now lovely place on a evening , well worth a stop and relax,,
Excellent happy hour. Excellent happy hour. Incredible views of the marina. Have also been for work functions in the past and the private rooms are well appointed and also have great views.
Great views of the Marina. We enjoyed fresh and tasty food at Aquara. Wonderful during the winter months where you can sit outside and enjoy the views. Tuesday nights ladies nights. Service average.

Ladies Night!. Great atmosphere unlike some of the "meat market" vibes you get from predators trawling for flesh. Being a guy in a long-term relationship it is nice to be able to take my girl out on a Tuesday and feeling relaxed enough to let her visit the bar or the bathroom without being chaperoned. All too rare in Dubai these days!

Aye Aye captain. Our visit to the Marina was an eye opener. The first thing I was impressed with was the beautiful staircase in the building. The yacht was an experience on its own. So worth the trip. the cabin crew were amazing and gave us the safety tips and then proceeded to guide us out of the marina. Its definitely worth spending money on. The beautiful buildings along the waterway just add to the romances and decadence of Dubai. Once we were out at sea they anchored and the brave few took a dip in the luke warm water. The food laid out was delicious and catered to everyones taste.Very relaxing and beautiful

Nice club. I went to this club twice with a friend. The service is nice. The view over the Marina and the night-lights from the skyscrapers creates a good atmosphere. The drinks are good. The music from the DJ is okay.

Ladies night out. My Wife joined some friends to celebrate a "certain age" Birthday and went to DMYC in style by Limo with some 14 friends and celebrants. The venue is very nice, with great views around Dubai Marina. She commented on how good the food was, especially seafood. A good choice for a party evening.

Great Marina Breakfast. We stopped by for late morning breakfast fry up. The breakfast ticked all the breakfast boxes, and sitting outside people watching and overlooking the water was the icing on the cake.
Great place for drinks and dinner. This is a great place to go for dinner and drinks and it is cheap on a ladies night as well. So, well worth going to.
Luxury. So many amazing yachts to gaze upon. The food here is great and you have a beautiful view of the boats as you eat. A good place for a stroll in the evening.

A lively Friday evening buffet, with great seafood. We decided to give the Yacht Club a whirl with some friends, after hearing some good comments, and allowing for time with families we went for the Friday evening, rather than the brunch.The restaurant was laid out invitingly, and we sat at the opposite end to the bar, nearer the food. Service was prompt and friendly, and given that a rage of cocktails were included in the set price, we thought we would have a few.The food was great. A good selection of starters, sea food, salad, whole Salmon, as well as Roast Beef, vegetables and more desserts than anyone needs!We would happily recommend this venue, and will be going back ourselves.
Las vegas on Dubai. We went here and did a cruise from here to the palm jumeirah and you can get amazing views of this part of Dubai.
