Amazing views and atmosphere . My brother took me and my wife for a few drinks here before going out on the town and we were very impressed. Just so happened to be ladies night were drinks were free for my wife. The music and views from the decked terrace were truly stunning and likened to what you would see in a movie. Exceptional and look forward to coming back soon.

Romantic and serene. We sent for a dhow cruise. Nice experience. Traditional local dace and food is served in the cruise as it takes off. Then music and Dubai skyline creates a very nice atmosphere.Food is below average

Evening with friends. Great for an enjoyable evening with friends here by the Marina at the terrace with great music and the happy hour drinks too. Lovely snacky food to go with it. Great ambience overlooking the Marina and JBR. You can come via yacht or taxi too.
stunning. perfect to look at, easy access by Metro, great view and very impressive, good for a 2 hour walkabout.
feels good to be there. very nice place. spent two evening out there...this place is extremely lively and you feel like you are in some US beach town
Good to visit. Fine place to visit and see all including many boats & Yachts.Free to enter and restaurant also available to dineYou can have nice walking inside marina with lot of relax time

Happy hour. All Very welcome at the yacht club , happy hour from 6-8 , then ladies night from 8 pm , it means that the ladies can have 3 free drinks but the gentlemen pay normal prices after 8 pm , in happy hour 50 dirham / £ 10 for 2 G&T , after that 50 dirham each but free to ladies . Most bars / restaurants do not have an alcohol licence , if you want beer or wine with your meal check where it is served lawfully . The yacht club also has a couple of restaurants . Views from the balcony bar are over the boats and water, lovely at night .

The best Yacht Trip Ever !. We had Rented a Yacht from Elite Pearl Charter.The Yacht was excellent and the Sighting on our route was even Better.It's an experience to rent a Yacht at Night and enjoy the Nightlife of Dubai.On the route we can even find Humongous Yachts belonging to various celebrities,princes and rulers of various countries.

Nice reastaurant with indoor and outdoor sections, very busy, good food. This is a nice location overlooking the water, excellent service from the car parking valet through to the restaurant. Booking essential. Staff very professional and helpful. Meals excellent. Its a lively location and a little noisy at night time as its beside an outdoor club which is not for every one. When booking ask for outside table.

Food, Fun and frolic. This is definitely a younger crowd venue and it can get loud.Cocktails are great, the steak we had was yummy and the water views are appealing. Great but definitely not your everyday spot if you're looking for peace and quiet.
Relaxing Experience!. Living across from the Yacht Club allows us a very comfortable environment to eat and drink in. The food is always delicious and the entertainment lively.

Excellent food with a great view. I've had several family and friends lunches here as well as an office Christmas dinner and it was superb. The food was very tasty and quickly served and the staff were very accommodating. It has a relaxing atmosphere paired with smart look and a fantastic view of the marina
Nice view !. Check this place of you are in Marina. You will find it relaxing and friendly. I liked the view, and orange juice was quite good experience over there :)

POOR SERVICE & Good Environment. Sad, but true, I live very close to the Marina Yacht Club, not to mention that I bought three properties in cash in Dubai and always try visiting the Yacht Club again and again, it is always a disappointment. Their service standard is below the carpet, but actually the service at KFC is better than the Yacht Club. I don't understand what makes it so hard to serve the customer and to deliver at least some service standard. One day it will improve, I simply believe in it. The welcome desk is fine, so are the doormen, the environment is great too, but their restaurant at the ground floor, rubbish.
A must when in Dubail. Beautiful marina set amidst tall buildings in all shapes and sizes.Lots of restaurants nearby. Good place to have lunch and relax.
Beautiful place with great restaurants. The views here are incredible, you get to see amazing yachts and sailboats and there are plenty options to have fine dining.
great for evening drinks and networking. found this place great to meet new people.. young crowd and great beer..parking is a big issue though so come in a cab

Nice View of the Marina. Quite a nice place of an evening for a few drinks early doors before the music gets annoying (sort of like being trapped in a lift but for 3 hours). Food is pretty good and quite reasonably priced

Chic, organized and pleasant. A public accesible Yacht Club (restaurants, bar and some other spa services), this Yacht club preserves users privacy by an access control both effective and discreet, allowing to enjoy the fantastic views over the marina.

Poor menu, great service . I live in Dubai and took my friend who was visiting from the UK here for dinner. As two foodies who eat out often, there were several things on the menu which weren't clear, for example 'chicken Bon Bon' with no explanation or description. The menu was also very limited and really expensive and I wouldn't have chosen it if I didn't have the entertainer (voucher app). The food when it came out was great and the service was amazing.Then we were offered the dessert menu.. See attached photo. It reads as three drinks, one dessert and one cheese board. We honestly thought there was a typo and we were given the after dinner drinks menu! The descriptions are really confusing and averages around 75dhs, which is a lot for a dessert, especially when you've got no idea what you're getting! Our waiter was super helpful and described everything, he also understood how poor the menu was as describing, which made us feel better! All in all the setting, food and staff (and there was a great deal on Prosecco at 50dhs a bottle!!) are brilliant, but the menu needs totally rewriting, which I would even volunteer to rewrite, being a journalist and writer myself! I would definitely come back, but the thing I'll be telling my friends about it the amazing Prosecco deal here as opposed to the 'great menu' , which is a real shame.
Awesome yacht. Dubai Marina Yacht club is one of the best place in the world. You can choose the best yacht and travel

Nice. Dubai Marina mall was pretty basic, however all the restaurants were really nice. Lots of different cuisines on each floor.Fab service. The Yacht club was exciting great views.It was nice and quiet around 12-1am great time to go i think.
Amazing location. Food was Ok - but this really is about the location. Sat on the balcony, overlooking the marina feels like you are part of the jet set.
Great place. Great place for food, nice staff and a beautiful view of Dubai Marina. It's nice to eat on the terrace enjoying the cool weather in December.

Fantastic Saturday Roast Dinner. Saturday Roast Dinner here is superb. I lived in the marina and went here a few times and it was brilliant. Ladies night on Tuesday is good as well for obvious reasons

Very interesting .... Sat by the water sipping our drinks overlooking the beautiful yachts and amazing high rise buildings where the ex-pats live, a little bit like St Katherine's Dock in London but much warmer...

Best breakfasts!. We came here 3 times whilst on holiday so that tells you it was good! The breakfasts here are excellent and the service is always fantastic. The views out to the marina are great so with that in mind it's a little pricier than some places but we didn't mind the extra considering the location it was well worth it. The cooked breakfast my husband loved and the pancakes and granola pot are also fab. Would definitely recommend

Restaurant well below standards. We went for a dinner with my wife. Menu has been changed recently. There is a choice of 4 starters, 4 mains and 4 desserts, nothing of which I would normally order. 2 of the main dishes are fish, one pork, one duck. I settled for the pork belly, which was inedible. It came with 2 green beans (TWO) and one piece of potato (ONE). The pork itself was fatty and it was impossible to chew, I had to put it into a napkin and leave the rest.Asked for the desert menu, the menu only said "Chocolate", "Acqua", "Tea and Coffee" and "Cheese". No explanation at all other than these funky names. Called the waiter and asked to explain what the cook James meant with such a lavish coloured fantasy of names and was told that Chocolate was "a kind of a mousse" and Acqua was "like Gin and Tonic". Perplexed I decided to play it safe and go for the Chocolate. It turned out to be JUST chocolate. One chopped up bit of milk choc, a couple of strips of white choc and a spoonful of very bitter gooseberry ice-cream. Again, I had to leave it. For our dining pleasure, we were hit with a bill of AED890 (well, we had 4 glasses of red) plus the bother of going home to get something to eat. I will never go back to Marina Yacht Club and would advise against it.
Superb Club with nice Marina view. Nice food (a bit pricey), variety of drinks (including alcohol), nice views. Specially the terrace is wonderful for mingling in the evenings...

The right place for some drinks with an outstanding view. If you fancy a drink and enjoy a superb view of Marina, the Yacht Club is the right place for you. It gets crowded on Tuesday (Ladies Night with free drinks for ladies) and on Thursday evening.

Great views. The large decking area is right underneath the many marina towers so youre surrounded by lights and water...and life. Even sat outside once wnd had xmas dinner out there. Very good to be fair.
good and fantastic club of marina. We been here for one time with my co worker friends, we have fun hang out, we relax ang enjoy exoeriencing inside

DUBAI MARINA YACHT CLUB. Dubai is an interesting city to visit as it is full of opulence and surprisingly stunning places set against a background that steps straight out of a movie set. Sitting on the terrace of the Dubai Marina Yacht Club sharing a couple of drinks with friends completely ticks all these boxes. This very large and spacious venue overlooks the marina with luxury yachts moored within it whilst the dinner cruise vessels sail up and down the waterway outside. The towers overlooking the marina rise up and light up the skyline which is a very impressive sight at night. A really fantastic setting and for anyone visiting should expect to be dazzled by this place. Tuesday night is Ladies night so I believe that the drinks are cheaper but like anywhere in Dubai, it can be expensive. A food buffet is also available but the atmosphere is very informal. Well worth a visit.

Ladies Night Free Drinks!!. Go on a Ladies Night which gives you 3 free tickets to ladies for either vodka, beer or wine. Great for people watching, lovely marina views and quite a few interesting characters!
Excellent experience. We booked and did a yacht ride which is one of the best experiences in my life. Once gets to see several iconic buildings.
Elitist. This is one club for the rich boys and girls. A trip on the yatch will leave you feeling very elitist. The speed on the waters and the glittering towers on the bay makes one intoxicated.

awesome. Guys, if you need real adventure of your life, you should go for it, its a awesome place and awesome experience of the life. YOu will live your life to the fullest if you go for this ride at this place, we had a private yatch party.see you back soon !!!

lovely brunch. we visited the dubai marina yacht club for friday evening brunch. we were sat out on the balcony which provided an amazing view over the marina. it was very hot though which slightly spoiled it. cocktails were great, the food was lovely although a roast dinner was an odd choice for a friday buffet i thought. the seafood was amazing in particular the king prawns. lovely night out and would defo recommend.

1st night of honeymoon!. We were taken to this amazing venue by friends on our 1st night of our honeymoon. Very classy and a fabulous ambience. The food that we had that night was 2nd to none! Many thanks to all involved for a truly magnificent experience!

Nice view attractive things around the marina. I was there in the beggining of may.Whether in the evening was fantastic.Road is fantastic for walking but it is too long to walk.There are carriages worth to use it.You can see all marina with vehicle..Also you can drink smthg on Pier Towres 7th floor..

awesome awesome. Guys, if you need real adventure of your life, you should go for it, its a awesome place and awesome experience of the life.YOu will live your life to the fullest if you go for this ride at this place, we had a private yatch party.
Great bar.. Bar is fun with wonderful views. Food downstairs in pub is OK -- bit overpriced for what it is but you pay for views and alcohol.

used to be so much better!. used to be a hot spot but it's now rowdy and full of very drunk guys looking for a fight. the big attraction is the stunning view, but with a crazy door policy that lets very drunk people in, it's not a place to bring a date or friends any more. just go there after a football match and you'll have some fun with the lads.
Pre-dinner drinks. Lovely location great service from a friendly bunch of staff. Early evening happy hour and ladies evenings make this club even more appealing.
Great views, chilled atmosphere. excellent for brunch at Aquara or for ladies nights drinks. Wonderful view of the Marina, does become very crowded however.

Brilliant Friday evening brunch. We booked last minute and managed to get a cancellation table. The views of the marina are lovely at night and the brunch had a great atmosphere. The food choices are more limited than the massive hotel brunches, but we found more than enough to suit us and the quality was excellent. I was particularly impressed with the sweets which often look great but just taste of sugar, every dessert we tried was divine, compliments to the chef! Wine was lovely and the cocktails were great, the brunch at 350dhs was good value. Service was outstanding and our waiter kept bringing drinks he thought we'd like. After we'd finished eating we had a final glass of wine at the lounge end of the terrace which was also enjoyable. A very relaxed and enjoyable evening. Mostly youngish adults, but there were some families.

Superb restaurant!. Enjoyed a superb evening here, fine bottle of wine, some of the best food I've ever eaten and a great atmosphere. The views onto the marina are gorgeous, we dreamt about what yacht we'd like to own one day while we dined! If I ever return to Dubai, I would return here without a doubt. Book to avoid disappointment.

Must try speacially ladies. A veyr fne located by the beach , dubai marine yacht club. This is a great hang out to enjoy a Music and great food. The best is they offer ladies night which ladies get exclusive cocktails and vines for free. A must try if you are in dubai

On of our favorite breakfast spots. We stayed in Dubai in different area's, but when we had a hotel or Airbnb in this area, we did our breakfast here. Great service and food. Complete english breakfast with nice sausage and bacon. I feld the vibrance of the people who where going out for a day with a luxury boat.
Ladies Night. Very busy, drinks expensive and no where to sit unless you paid for a table. However nice location & an experience!

Excellent. Came in here with my family before going on the xclusive yacht. Very relaxed atmosphere and the staff are all very nice. Beautiful views of the marina, unfortunately didn't eat here just had a couple of cocktails which were made to perfection. Would definitely visit here again thought it might have been quite staid, but I have to say it was very friendly. Definitely worth a visit.

LADIES NIGHT. Every tuesday every female in Dubai gets free drink... so we went out for a look. The Marina Yacht Club was the perfect setting to start the night, 90UED for two white wines sat out on the balcony overlooking some fantastic yachts and near by hotels and buildings. An amazing experience.

Great food and reasonable prices given the restaurant's fab location. I visited the Dubai Marina Yacht Club for the 1st time during a recent visit to Dubai. The overall choice of menu was excellent and the quality of food outstanding. Although the overall service could have been a bit quicker our party wasn't in a hurry so it didn't trouble us unduly. Well worth a visit.

Lovely place for pre dinner drinks . Popped in for cocktails before dinner- the cocktails were great the ambience was lovely and the staff lovely and attentive but not over the top! The view was lovely especially early evening! Cocktails were around £8 each- well worth it
Top place for drinks with a view. I visit Dubai often and this is a great location for business meetings, top class drinks, great views and not full of tourists.

Best party venue in Dubai. Thank you so much for helping pull off a huge surprise for my husbands 50th. Couldn't have done it without Jessica Carmen, who worked tirelessly to put together the perfect party and the perfect party menu. The venue has both indoor and outdoor space with excellent views of the marina and catered for approx. 50 adults and 20 children effortlessly. Everybody had a fabulous evening - Most of all my husband. Thanks again to Jessica, the chef and all the wonderful staff who helped make it a night to remember. Jan Finnigan. Dubai.
Wonderful view. You should go there for a drink. It has awesome view! Many European nice people, nice atmosphere which I really liked.

Excellent for yatch lovers. Charter a private yatch all afternoon and feel good as gold. Excellent choice brilliant service and crew.Little expensive but book it in advance you won't be disappointed and will bump into one or two minor celebs.

just an experience... Ok, I will admit, is not mine cup of tea... it is nice to grab a light lunch and enjoy the view, meet for business ... If you up to drinking, this kind of your place. Good location, if you fed up, can go for a walk in Marina walk..
Very good!!. I love this place! they gave me and my team, one of the best nights of our lives !! This was the first time but not the last night when we went on a yacht
Great place to chill. Beautiful friendly place for lunch or dinner,Spotlessly clean and a great place to see the boats,Well worth a visit
Nice Experience.. Interesting space for friends gathering, extra fine preparations and friendly atmosphere. not recommended within the high humidity weather.
Great. In the heart of the city, absolutely stunning views! This place is amazing! The sports bar is not that great, but the restaurant is fabulous!
Dubai marina Yacht Club. Not much of a wow average place with nice Restaurant near the yachts & Marina view which have nice Fish & Chips but the place need more marketing to be busy.

Join the club!. We chartered a yacht for a day and it was so much fun. The views are wonderful and when we came in to dock at night the lights in the city were just a sight to take in. You have to bring your own adult-beverages and food as they only provide light bites and soda/juice in the package.

Strange place. There are two bars here and I'm not sure which is the poorer of the two. Downstairs is trying to be a sports bar serving drinks from what appears to be a sand which display case. Upstairs is like ordering drinks before taking your seat in a theatre. Both unforgettable only remembered for one strange rule that they have. You cannot smoke inside but can smoke outside however, you can drink inside but not outside. Bizarre.

Great Yatch Club. The yatch club is located on Sh. Zayed road side of Dubai Marina & not in JBR side. Club hosts some quality restaurants as well.The yacht parking area looks beautiful & great place for clicking photo & best place as well for walk/jogging.Now under the crossing bridges between Marina & JBR small playing area has been created which keeps your children's busy while you are busy. Not to forget to have bicycle ride. Prepaid bicycles are available near the Yatch club & credit card are accepted for hiring the bicycle.

Yachting made easy. The yacht club was an amazing experience with great views of the city. My party and I rented a private yacht. The moments that were captured can hardly be explained. This is a must do when visiting Dubai. It was not over crowded and the fact that Burj Khalifa was nothing but a blink away made the excursion more memorable.
Amazing complex. A man gets speachless while visiting the Dubai Marina. Far away from any conventional marina. Very nice andwell maintained complex.
Great nightlife and sailing. There are some yacht rentals around the yacht club making it great for everyone who likes to sail.They also have some good nightlife, including food there.

Great spot on a Tuesday night. This is a great spot to go to on a Tuesday night as its ladies night. The lady gets three free drink vouchers. There is a great atmosphere here and good eclectic mix of people with good music. There is are lovely view of the Marina, lit up by the lights on the palm trees.
Perfect. Well its a great place to eat , drink & hang out . The view is amazing & ofcourse you can see luxury yachts . The whole area is just perfect
Marina Club. great place to eat and drink on their balcony overlooking the marina yatchs. Not a lot of money either. There is a bar area that plays all major sports.

Fun Ladies Night. We went out on a Ladies night. The place was packed by 10 pm but before that was easy to move and interact with people.We had 3 free drinks on the house (sangria and a vodka cocktail).Most of people were just out of the office and stopped to have dinner and drinks.It was fun, easy conversation and a great way to meet people if you're new to Dubai. The view is great and added to the enjoyment of the evening. The music was most of the time entertaining but that it's a matter of taste.

beautiful marina. A beautiful place to see at night. We came here for dinner at aquara and was able to go downstairs to the walk afterwards. You can see the dhow boats and many yachts to charter. We didnt do any but the view is amazing. Its a great place to go hang out for a nice stroll.

Beautiful. Wow is the only word. During my Dubai stay I stayed opposite to it and one of my friends took me to the club. We actually went on the new year eve and the yachts were decorated with beautiful music and dinner. Its a place to visit when you are in Dubai. Best enjoyed in the evening. Whos who of Dubai can be found here.

Great stop off place for everyone.. Great eateries and Sports Bar. We found two restaurants here both excellent and within walking distance of our apartment. We use this place regularly when we visit Dubai. If you want to see that Football or Rugby game then the Sports bar was very good and the Staff very friendly and helpful.
Yacht Club. Great place , here you can hire a yacht and there are lots of website which sells discounted yacht tour so do check it out if you are on marina walk as it is just on the Walk.
for those who want nothing but the best. This place is near my place of stay, very classy , elegance and tasteful place, for those who want nothing but the best

Great place. Food lovely, service superb and staff friendly. Location is beautiful with outstanding views. Would recommend to everyone. Slightly on the expensive side, but in dubai most things are pricy!

Good ladies night!. Great place to take visitors for sunset drinks on the outside balcony overlooking the Marina. They also do a good ladies night on Tuesdays with 3 free drinks for the ladies. Great mix of deep house tunes spun by the DJ.

Great breakfast. Went on a Friday morning and it was very busy so recommend booking if you plan to visit. Nice setting overlooking The Marina and breakfast was first rate. Service lets the place down a bit but as I said, it was very busy
Relax and enjoy. A great place to watch the world go by and see the most amazing boats. Good food, alcohol available inside

Yacht Charters Leave From Here. Many of the private yacht charters leave from the Dubai Marina Yacht Club. The yacht club's staff was very polite and eager to assist my party when we were looking for our tour company. thanks!
Social hotspot. Good place to visit especially at happy hour. Sit inside or on the balcony. Restaurants in the club are excellent.
lights!. very cool environment light music good food, the cruise dinner is good for making friends. and a wonderful tip to watch all the dubai attractions at a time and yes lot of pictures!
Great night out. We visited the yacht club on an evening and had a great time, staff, food and service was fantastic. Great little addition to add to your travel plans

Unforgettable !!!!. The Marina bay view is breathtaking. We boarded a private Yacht for the night from there. Everyone was friendly (both staff of the yacht club as well as the Xclusive Yachtt). It was absolutely a fun filled night out. One not to be forgotten so soon.
Reasonable spot for dinner. A nice venue overlooking the Marina but overpriced for what you get. They do have a 2 for 1 on Entertainer which makes it more reasonable.
Evening relaxation. Haven in Dubai . Who does like to sit in a marina and watch the sun go down ,? This one is very high class and enjoy the experience in the outset deck of a cool bar
Scrumptious brekkie!!!. A fantastic venue for breakfast and a tea. The breakfast comes ii the original pan it was cooked in, hot, fresh and scrumptious. The view is second to none too.
Decent place with great view !. A decent experience, which is remarkable by the view but not always by the food. Take someone there to marvel at the Marina by night
Bar next door , totally worth it. a bar next door for me, amazing view and always buzzing with good crowd. No bouncers or annoying entry fee concept. Ladies nights / gentlemen nights are always fun.
Serenity after busy hours. This is a place where you can spend with only yourself, your partner, your spouse, or your family. The view, the fun, and the food all are great!
A place to chill with friends or family.. A good place to chill with friends and family.I had visited in night.So don't know how it is in day time.

OMG!!!!. Breath taking place to be. the scenery from this place is just fantastic, eating while you over see the waterfront, with tourist and locals jet boats doing their own thing. I love to go back over and over and over with my family.
Great Night Life. The Marina Yacht Club is a great place to get drinks and hang out with friends. I would go back again.
Good buzzing Bar. Good bar and good food, breafast is one of teh best in Dubai ( and the serve pork. ladies night is a bit hectic, but a good vibe. nice setting overlooking Dubai Marina

Saturday Night Buffet . Have been to the Marina Yacht Club a few times for the Saturday night buffet and really enjoyed it. If you go in the winter months you can sit outside and have the great views of the Marina and also get a great view of the live music that isn't normally playing. The food is great, it's a English Roast type buffet so was bringing back memories of growing up in London. For 150 aed it's pretty good value for money. Recommended

Dubai Marina - Yachts, restaurants and walk. Located in one of Dubai's most vibrant residential areas Dubai Marina is spread over a man made canal. It has a beautifully designed stunning clubhouse with exclusive bars, coffee shots, restaurants and lounges. It is a waterfront destination for residents and tourists. It is a world of Yachts.. you can find all luxurious yachts here in Dubai.. a good place to go for an evening or morning walk (not recommended during summer)
just another spot. sunset is blocked by the towering building of Jumeirah Beach Residences. but you have a view of the small boats parked in the marina!
expat hang out spot. Its a good place to get a casual drink- though they do have a dresscode of smart casual (like all places in dubai). Mostly an expat adn pot work hang out
Beautiful place - nice tourist sight :). Beautiful Marina, enjoyed a wonderful hired boat ride complete with champagne and lovely music. A lovely way to spend an afternoon I say. also

Cool place!. There is a night club next to the yachts where you can see all the marina. Nice air-condition inside and cooling fans outside where you can stay for sone time if its august and very hot. Try it!

Club's Nice but nOot baad. Architecturally stunning clubhouse with exclusive bars, restaurants and lounges on a man-made canal... Its Suprb club But not for Family To much Joy You should visited Wd Frnds Onluy

Yachts, shops and friends. A very nice place to stop by while visiting the area whether for coffee, shopping or a salad. Beautiful dock from which you can enjoy the yachting activities ... well, I had never seen any but nice boats !

Improving Venue. This venue had a dreadful start a few years ago but has gradually improved. The evening events on the upper level terrace are fun but very load. Great music, good prices during happy hour and very busy. The sports bar on the lower level works well unless you want to watch the European Champions League matches. They close just as the matches start... idiots!

Trying to be more than it is. The layout & decor aspire to the exclusivity of private yacht-clubs from the west but staff & visitors are of a wider-draw.Cocktails were passable but slow in coming.Facilities for the water-borne are good with many berths nestled within the curve of the marina basin.

Enjoy life like there is no tomorrow!!!. We were renting a yacht with friends! It was gorgeous!!! we feel like you are VVIP, billionare and enjoying the life like there is no tomorrow!!! incredible!!! DJ Alexis was playing for us and that what create described atmosphere!!! Highly recommend to everyone!

It's a bar.... on the marina. It's like most of the bars round this area, pretentious, glitzy, and over the top. It's a place for people to show off, preen and pose. If you like that sort of thing go along and look at the boats in the marina.
However, it's not a place for me.

Twisted Skyscraper in Dubai's Marina. Carol and I wandered through the Marina. I was fascinated by the skyscraper that was built with a twist. I couldn't believe that so much money was available to create such a difficult engineering problem just for an optical effect. But amazing nevertheless.

Serene by the sea. Amazing place for a family outing or catch up with friends or a couple evening out...
It offers options to sail on a boat...or enjoy drinks with a outdoor view over looking the marina...or dining options as well...
Yacht club Dubai Marina lovely place. Lovely place , really enjoyed a drink outside looking over the Marina gorgeous at night. A bit pricey but it is nice and a very friendly place.
Stunning. Great yachts to gaze at and amazing skyscrapers. Looks great at night with all the area lit up. Good choice of restaurants around the marina.
amazing. one of the best places in the world is there if you like Yacht life and Yacht clubs feel free to come here and enjoy the night

Drinks with friends. Nice friendly welcome from the staff on entry...the service to the table was good. It was Ladies Night so all bit mad but overall good fun. Worth a trip for drinks with friends...
Nice place to spend the day with a beer. If you love looking into the sea and enjoying the breeze and a beer , this is the best place to do that.
Views of the marnia are amazing!. Incredible views of the marina & good deals on ladies night too, although can get VERY busy and cramped with not much seating space!! But really nice location!

Yacht Ride at Marina Yacht Club. Dubai Marina Yacht Club should be visited for at least 3-4 hours Yacht Ride which takes you around Marina, Burj al Arab and around Palm Jumeirah Islands and Atlantis. The ride is worth every penny spent.
Beautiful marina view. Marina yacht club is of of the best spots in dubai marina to enjoy the view, food, night life of marina! I really enjoy spending time with my friends there.

When love is in the Air (and in the water!). A late evening stroll around the Dubai Marina Yacht Club is as romantic as any Nicholas Spark would describe! The benches around the marina, the trees, the restaurants, the music.. it is simply perfect for you to relax and stare at the brilliance in each of the architecturally acclaimed sky-scrappers of Dubai.

See and be seen. This is where you will see the Who's who of the world. Lovely eateries chilled and trendy. Aquara was amazing they give a new meaning to brunch, here you enjoy brunch under the stars. Aquara is by no means cheap costing me Aed 700 for two of us but the ambiance and great service made up for it.

Nice meal, beautiful setting. Went for brunch with a coeliac guest. They were aware from booking, and immediately brought a chef to explain what she could eat, gluten free bread was made specially for her. Not the widest selection of food, but well done - particularly the dessert.
Great for a night out. If you want to hire a Boat, have a meal overlooking the Marina, or just a drink, you will be really impressed with the Yacht Club. The bars can get a bit busy at the weekends.

Bring guests for a wow view. I visit the Yacht Club occasionally. The inside decor isn't much compared to some other bars in the city but the out side view is exceptional with the yacht lights and marina skyline reflecting off the water! The alcohol is relatively priced and the ambience is always quite relaxed.

beautiful night and day. during day time, amazing for a brunch. when the weather is good, no place in dubai i think is better.at night, specially on ladies night, they have a nice live band, drink selection is nice as well as the scene.highly recommended

good views and vibe. Good spot in the evening for sundowners with the lights coming on in the Marina. Decent food too, drinks an average price, but not bad for the location. They quite often have DJs and a pretty up market and chilled vibe full of beautiful people strutting their stuff.There is a sports bar downstairs and in the morning they do a very good stab at an full english, served in a frying pan. Worth a visit for sure.
small venise. It was really nice-with alcoholic drinks!that you coud not find anywhere eccept 5 star hotels!It has good restaurants and bars there-It reminds you of venise.
Pleasant. Receptionist was pleasant and helped us out when we were looking for sightseeing tours however it was not for tourists on a budget.

what a lovely walk and picture opportunity. what a lovely walk and picture opportunity make sure u definitely take ur camera and go for a visit even if its only for a drinklovely things to see and some amazing yachts and people around.took up 3/4 hours just walking around and stopping for drinks chatting and snapping photos.defiantely worth another visit and a gem to Dubai xx
Good Ambiance. Enjoyed a nice time with colleagues there. Loved the music. Enjoyed the girls night :) Nice place to hang out and spend a nice time.
One for the Bucket List. Fantastic view of the Marina. When you add the first class food it is one of the places that is a must do.
Local for a great time. Yacht club is very popular with Expats across Dubai. I have been to Yacht club on regular bases for far too long!! It is a great place to meet friends and have a great time!
nice walk. can catch up with friends and spend time around walking. kids can run around but not much to do as a tourist.

What a View!. If you're into Modern Infrastructure ad all, this place is for you. Visit in the evening for great views. You may reach there a little early around 5:00pm to 5:30pm before it gets dark. Visit to the Marina Open Beach first through "JBR - The Walk" (must visit area) and to marina mall too, then you may go for some cruising when it gets little dark to enjoy the Dubai MArina that sparks in all the four directions and you're between the tallest skylines in your cruise, boat, yatch whatever you would like to choose.

Yacht club with a view. Friendly friendly people shoes of onto the yacht and a stop over at the ONE and Only restaurant for dinner all the tall buildings with the colour lights on at knights looks very pretty please go and try this
Nice place. Nice place to walk. Lots of places around to drink and eat. Cinema and many more attractions close to this area

With friend of. One have a boat. we spend a nice time first time I new that the have autopilot I am captain the captain of the boat he left me alone he went down to cheek the engine when he came back i told hime I was worried he told everyone me no no this boat make avoiding so no problem

Best Kept Secret. Have been going here for years….. and sitting out on the multileveled decking over the water is very relaxing…best at lunchtime for the view...especially watching the odd Dhow or Arbra water taxi pass by …. The food is generally good … but I must admit I go there for the view and the ambience…service can sometimes be a bit slow when its busy… there is also a fancier restaurant upstairs which I haven't been to for a long time but last time the food was great and the view marvelous …especially during the shopping festival when you have the fireworks going as a bonus
amazing and sharming. nice place with wonderful location and too many café where you can drink, eat and entertain in addition to Shisha with lovely flavors.you will never regret to sit there
Nice night walk. It was very hot, but we walked almost all the way down the marina. Most of the restaurant were located at one side, but it was worth it walking all the way.

Excellent Restaurants. Excellent choice of restaurants at Dubai Marina Yacht Club. Aquara restaurant and lounge bar is a fantastic location to have a meal and drink on the terrace over looking Dubai Marina. 25 55 is also a great bistro downstairs and if you prefer a more relaxed atmosphere, visit Yots sports bar. Still great food and drink whilst able to watch sporting events on TV. Great service in all outlets.

Great Food and Stunning Location. Lovely place to go for dinner. Do watch out on the happy hour menus, they will offer you the menu (mainly bottles), then when taking orders, they will ask if you'd like a pint, so you assume that this was the drink of the happy hour menu, however, its not and you get charged full price. I get the feeling that this must be done on a regular basis. Food very nice, and lovely if you can get a seat outside over looking the Marina.

Awesome, Beautiful Setting. Not often you can say that for a modern day, man-made, high building surrounded, city location. It's true though.We were there in the evening.A peaceful, safe and interesting stroll before a meal in one of the many high quality restaurants. How can they make modern day buildings look so stunning and so different?If you go here you must take a camera.
A Must... Incredible, go early or in the evening, it is beautiful and you will really enjoy the visit. Do not miss out on this if you visit Dubai.
Lovely evening. Loved the view. I appreciated that it was quiet enough to have a nice conversation. Wonderful food and service.

marina yacht club/marina walk. marina yatch club is on marina walk place n it is vary very butifull place in dubai n racomanded to go in evening so u can enjoy both in sunlight n in night vuew i like very very much i spent 5 hour their it is walking distanc from DAMAK PROPRATY metro station

Cruise at Night. Ok so if the weather is good, go for a day cruise but the real fun is when you cruise at night. The Dubai Marina views at night are splendid to say the least. Worth every penny. Make sure to put on Frank Sinatra while you're at it, makes the cruise so much more pleasurable. The club also has good grub options so make the most of them.

Once in a lifetime experience. If you dont mind spending the extra bit do consider hiring a yacht at the dubai marina and enjoy the evening with friends or family. You have to boon in advance. Take a time slot for late in the evening or post dinner to enjoy the skyline of Dubai Marina

stunning views, nice place, must visit. If you want a place to enjoy an evening with stunning Marina views, Live music, and unique evening to remember, Just visit this place. You can also enjoy free drink at their happy hour on daily basis.It is a nice place for dining in or just having drinks and hang out in a very nice and lively atmosphere.It is crowded in the evening especially weekends. Make sure you go early and book your seat :)Valet Parking service is available for free. You can walk in the Marina area by going few steps down and come back

Last ladies night before Ramadan - brilliant drinks. Went with some friends for drinks on the last ladies night before ramadan. The atmosphere and the views of the marina were incredible. Everyone was in the mood and the temperature was perfect outside despite the daily heat - perhaps that was the cold beer??Would recommend this for a few cold one's anytime!!
dubai marina. Dubai marina Yacht club ..its an awesome place, give's you a RICH feeling, this is a normal mans paradise..
Relaxed and relatively unpretentious. Nice setting on the marina. Decent prices during happy hour and a crowd of good looking people pack the place out on Thursday and Friday night.

Nice cruise with the skyskrapers. We took a cruise from the dubai marina yacht club and it was great, food was nice and the cruise was a long one, we enjoyed it a lot, we enjoyed watching dubai skyskrapers. i would recommend it to everyone visiting dubai
Hang out here in the evening. really cool place to watch the the evening lifestyle in Dubai and sip some great cool drinks, really cool
it's mind blowing expiriance. it was wonder full experience . I was been there with friends and I remember every moment of this place . I visited this place 3 time in 1st trip

Spectacular Views. While it was very busy the night we visited the Marina Yacht Club, we were so glad we went there, the views of the marina by night are amazing, its a different world there...definitely recommend a visit here
Chic. Very chic & classy place. Good to entertain clients or down a couple of drinks with a loved one. Love the ambiance. Wait staff could be a bit more courteous.
Nice place . Every Tuesday is ladies night. This place to drink and talk. Nice stuff, very polite. Приятное место для общения и знакомства

Very Chic. Spent an evening in the yacht club, the temperature outside was still almost 40 degrees but the views across the marina to the apartments and yachts is worth a visit but the coolness of the A/C and atmosphere inside was very welcome. With the DJ playing to differing age groups made for quite a chic evening. Go there to be seen.

Great place to spend a relaxing evening with good food.. As a Yacht club most people would think its members only, but its not, a fantastic place to visit in the evening for a meal, the food is very good, then sit out on the large balcony and enjoy the night views of Dubai marina and beyond.

Used as a Conference venue. Used this as a conference venue and you could not find a better setting, catering and staff is superb. we also enjoyed a very good Thursday night (the Party night) after we had finished. the bar and restaurant are a must on any visit

The most frustrating dining experience ever!. Food terrible, service even worse! Had to ask for everything at least 4 times, it actually became quite amusing seeing everyone in the restaurant trying to wave down the service team for assistance. The manager was sooooo out of his depth. Tip - rather than disappoint do a breakfast buffet or don't accommodate additional tables when you are already struggling to cope - all in all the biggest waste if money in my 5 years in Dubai! - I gave the manager the chance on numerous occasions to rectify .... Hopeless!

Good. Gone for this during Dubai stay and it was really good to see night and lights. It's really good and someone who feel or think this will be as same as Hong Kong ferry ride at night no it's way better and good and dinner was really awesome. So give this a try and enjoy the evening with your companion.
Nice relaxing bar with a great location. Dubai Marina Yacht Club is a comfortable, relaxing bar right on the Marina offering great views of Dubai’s many yacht's.
celebrated my birthday on the yatch. it was like a dream come true.superb experience ...shining dubai lights rustling sea and the sea breeze beating at your face

Stunning View, Amazing F&B. DMYC is a man made canal and have breathtaking views, choice of restaurants, bars and lounges. Ideal place for perfect night out, weekend drink and dine and a romantic date.F&B: 5 starAmbiance: Perfect for any occasionPrice: Bit expensive but worth spendingParking: AvailableLocation: Dubai Marina

Mouth-watering surprising brunch awaits you!!!. amazing brunch, great view, relaxing view, friendly staffs and most especially price is right specially now that the market of Dubai is slow. A must visit!we were amazed with the foods - from cold seafood appetizers, pork selection, barbeque on the terrace and a must indulged various deserts.place is great for family, trendy millenials, good for a girly talks and etc...

Pretentious yet popular. If you like pretentious and upper class, then you are surely to find that here. The Yacht club to me has failed to provide an atmosphere which makes me wanting more. Either too quiet, or too busy and a whole lot of looking goodness! So if you want to get your strut on, and be on the water, I guess this is a good little venue to do that!
luxury yatch. excellent club with super luxury yatches, certainly a must see for all people who want to sea the cresent view of palm jumeira.

Lunch at the Marina. On arrival we were greeted by the receptionist saying she had reserved us a table in side or out we took the outside option and were very pleased, Very Exclusive, beautiful views ,food was fantastic,
Happy Hour worth a visit. Great little place. We spent a good evening here knocking back the cocktails at an alarming rate! The Marina is beautiful at night and this is the best bar there.

A Pleasant Mid-week Dinner. She and I wandered across the boardwalk from the adjacent Park Hyatt, and were made very welcome. No problem about being a non-member. Offered all the different eating venues. Elected to eat by the marina, outside on the deck by Dubai Creek. Good menu, reasonable prices and recommendable. Much more peaceful than one of the other outdoor options, with decibels like a rock concert.

the only part of Dubai that I really like. We like to stay at the Park Hyatt hotel, in the creek. It is where the marina is located.Walking around the marina at night is really pleasant. You can enjoy a beautiful skyline view. The view is not obstructed but buildings. It is quiet and you don't really hear the car traffic.After the Marina, you can have dinner or have a drink in one of the terrasses of the Park Hyatt hotel, and continue enjoying the view.
Very nice, but members only. Very nice area, nice and clean. Worth taking a trip to marina.Beautiful views and scenery.Very quiet and relaxing, with lounge chairs.
good yacht ride.. Yacht ride is good. you can see burj al arab, burj khalifa and palm atlantis while taking yacht ride.
Overcrowded. Its over crowded. Getting a parking spot took 2 hours. Take a cab. Make reservations well in advance

Evening time. Lucky us, our host live directly on the Marina.And what a beauty by night with all the high rise and the lights, the boat flotting along and peoplehaving dinner, or enjoying their evening with a slow walk along

Nice and chilled evening. Good for a nice drink during the week. Apparently gets much busier at the weekends though. They hired a very good singer although his music is a tiny bit too loud so having a conversation might prove challenging

Eat, walk, relax and enjoy the view. This is a great place just to relax, enjoy the day and if you are before dawn, it will be amazing to see the buildings and how the sight changes.It reminded me of a boardwalk.
Happy hour. The happy hour is great with live music. The view is amazing overlooking all the yachts. I went 3 times in one week and will definetly be going back.
great venue. loved everything, from the venue to the food, music and drinks. one of my favourite places in dubai.

Relaxing Marina. Lovely place to walk around, take in the scenery, or grab a bite to eat. Everything is new, organized, clean, and there are some green incentives with the recycling and bikes for rent.

Its OK. The marina is a nice walk... quite romantic actually - but everything is pricey. We found the food mediocre, but the atmosphere and scenery made up for it... Might try the Cruise with dinner next time - but that is around 715 dhirams p.p

We had high hopes. We visited the Yacht Club after family had said it was great, but we were very disappointed by the service. We sat outside on the bean bags and although the view was lovely of the Marina, the service was a real shambles. Different waiter's coming over to take our order after it had already been taken by someone else, then being left with a table of empty glasses for over 20 minutes and then actually having to get up and ask for another round. The prices were good, the cocktails were nice... but nothing overwhelming so we moved on to another bar where we were given a bit more attention.
delight. nothing better relaxing with a glass of wine, overlooking the marina, was spectacular.....breath taking...worth a visit

Lot's of skyscrapers and that's it. I found Dubai Marina quite boring after the initial first ten minutes. When you're done checking out the sky line and some of the bigger yachts it's actually quite boring. You can walk along the water line and sit down somewhere, just watch out for the agressive tactics of the waiters who try to pull you in the restaurant.

Excellent. The yacht club and the marina for a nice stroll in the evening sunshine with a large variety of restaurants to choose from or just sit and enjoy the ambience if the whole set up. Best way for people to find out is try it you will be surprised

Ahhh just amazin. Marina is probably my first favorite place in Dubai. Its just for everyone! Either you want to go for a run, or just sit down and read a book. Dine? No problem - there are plenty restaurants in there. Cannot stop thinking about tall those beautiful boats and atmosphere in dubai marina

Great place in Dubai. Yacht club is definetely one of the must see places in Dubai. Excellent place for lunch, dinner, drinks or evening hangout with friends. Also very often live music entertaining the guests. Also have had one of my best dinner experiences in Dubai at Yacht club.

Fantastic. I visited this place twice on my last trip to Dubai and really enjoyed it! The first time was a Friday evening where we were lucky enough to get some of the comfortable seats outside with the spectacular views of the marina and we had a few chilled out drinks. My second visit was on a Tuesday night for ladies night following the recommendation of my friend and it was as good as he had told me. We got there early and managed to avail of a few happy hour drinks before the crowds arrived. It started to get busy from about 9pm onwards and the atmosphere was really good with a nice crowd of decent people. Mainly an expat crowd with all sorts of nationalities and ages. There was some barbecue food available too although we didn't have any. I will definitely return here on my next visit to Dubai!

Great place. Modern yet serene, plenty of benches to sit down and rest your feet, good to walk and bicycle,, all kinds of restaurants around the marina, far from downtown, but worth a stop if your headed in that direction.

Great view of the city!. This place has ambiance, great views, great service, great food and a great selection of wines. The cheese platter was awesome, pizza was a bit wimpy. But we've been here a few times and enjoy it every time!

For the rich and beautiful!. My husband and I who are young at heart mid 40's went here for ladies night, where all ladies get 3 free wines or named cocktails. It was absolutely packed, we managed to get served eventually and my husband had to ask for his change which was more than what the price of the drinks where, the waiter was automatically going to keep it as a tip!No chance of getting a seat so stook out on the balcony overlooking the marina, which was lovely. However it is just full of young beautiful people competing with everyone else, and really not our scene at all. We left after 1 drink.

Awesome place offering breathtaking views and variety of yatchs. It is located right in middle of the marina walk area....the club offers variety of yatchs on hire or jet ski etc for hire.. The club has a restaurant offering food and really good coffee. its a best place to visit in evening.

Great.. After a long walk at the marina, and tanning at the marina beach we walk to dubai marina yacht club to take a drink. Exlusive and nice:) they have happy hour every day, and ladies night each tuesday.

A great night out with a lot of expats!. A great location, a great view! The crowd are great as it is a popular destination for all the expats living in Dubai. So it was a great mixed great of people with great attitudes in a relaxed environment. The food was great also.
lovely location. Yes we had lovely time at the Dubai Marina Yacht Club, great ambience. Wonderful views over the marina.

Happy hour. Went for happy hour drinks and loved it. Was a little worried as we were a tad casual after being on the beach all day but wasn't a problem. Drinks were cheap, service was good and the view was stunning. A lovely start to our evening. Would thoroughly recommend it.

A lovely evening at the yacht club. The food was really good. We had tapas style, with prawns and risotto balls, it was all very good, although not filling enough so we had to order more as portions tend to be small. Really enjoyed it and the service was very attentive. A great night!
super view. also is very nice to take a tour in Dubai Marina special in the evening time with all towers full lighting is amazing view.
Lunch. Friday lunch - excellent location and food - and a super place to watch the world go by. Busy at weekend - book a table to be assured of lovely lunch

Marina views. Unfortunately as we wanted wine with our meal we had to sit in the inside restaurant area.We had spent the afternoon on the yellow speedboat tour and were looking forward to a relaxing bottle of wine.Would return again for lunch and sit outside to enjoy the passing boats and marina views.Food was excellent and serving staff very helpful and friendly.
Great views over the Marina. Great meeting place for family and friend, a super place to relax and enjoy the views over the waterway. Food and drink reasonably priced.
Happy hour with Dim Sum. This is a great place to have a quiet relaxing drink with a few nibbles, particularly during the happy hour. The dim sum are excellent.
Dubai marina yacht club. Nice place to take a yacht to see around. the yacht takes you through waters and covers all the important and nice buildings of Dubai. one can see the small islands as well.
Great marina. Very good marina, we went on a private boat trip, they show us everything for 3 hours tour, sea was exciting .... Another wise could be done more.

Exciting spot for a dinner. Go to the shopping mall and enter the tower building with 7 different restaurants in different styles and prices. Take a table on the terrace for an excellent view on the harbor.
Great Place to walk. Me and my wife walked here and it was beautiful and romantic, my biggest complaint would be the amount of cigarette butts all over the ground.
Great cocktail venue. Wonderful outlook over the JBR Marina -make sure you are well dressed and proper shoes gents.Good choice of cocktails witha Happy Hour option if you are early.Nice nibbles too!

Meeting up with friends while enjoying the view. Meet up with some friends here. Place was lovely we had a table in the aquaria lounge on the terrace overlooking the marina. It was a great venue the enjoy watching the world go by and seeing the colourful tour boats sailing by all light up. Staff were friendly and helpful.
Amazing cruise. The cruise experience is brilliant in the evening, as you pass by the magnificent structures. Excellent experience and a must do if you haven't done cruise yet.
Good-- Nice place. Nice place to spend evening enjoy marina walk .. see to white yatch on blue water its really eye soothing experience

Not again. The venue is exceptional but the table service is slow, if not blind, tunnel vision is not an attribute of service staff and the constant huddle of staff talking amongst them selves, combined with an interest only to sell more mediocre happy hour selections of drinks was just too tacky by far
we found this little gem. what a bar in the middle of the Marina and it serves booze... dont know how it manages that not being a hotel ... but love it !!!!!!!
Awesome. It sounds cool, nice view of tall buildings with nice yacht club. i have really enjoyed . clean and neat beach ,outstanding services. I would love to visit next time.

Lovely lunch. We stopped here for lunch and we were not disappointed. If you want an alcoholic drink then you need to go inside. The Windows are tinted so you cannot see in. The menu provides a good selection of food and drink and the service was very good.

Not my favorite any more. This place used to be one of my favorite. We used to come with friends for drinks and few times for brunch. Amazing view on the city, nice food and cocktails, nice crowd, nice staff. It is all still there apart from staff. I had few incidents before but the last one was too much and I decided that will not go there any more. I came with the group of friends and one of them was buying the 1st round of drinks - I requested Mojito and got is , everything was fine. 2nd round was on me and one the friends asked to buy, if they have, Caiperinha. When I approached the bar on the terrace I was told that they do not make cocktails and sent me to the bar inside. Inside bar was not very busy, few staff was just standing behind the bar, however took them a while to pay attention at me. When I requested for cocktails I was said in a very rude way: We do not do cocktails-mocktails here" I said: "Just sometime back I got Mojito from this bar and now you are telling me that you do not do it" He was refusing to believe me and got so extremely upset that someone prepared a cocktail for a customer. Called someone who was also not very polite and when I told the 2nd person that before I already bought a Mojito from this bar he asked from whom? I said: I do not remember..from you (I meant the bar). He pointed at himself - From me.. you bought it from me? At this point I stared to get angry and said that no matter from whom... I want a Mojito (forget about caiperinhi - it seemed like these people never heard about it) - So they called a 3rd guy who started to mix Mojitos for me. My last disappointment of that evening was when I saw that instead of tonic the guy added 7up. I left shortly after this and do not have any wish to come back. It is not a cheap place and customers deserve some respect.

Great place for an evening drink. Situated on the Marina this is a great place for a drink if out for a walk. Good music and good friends made for an enjoyable evening.Beautiful views and great beer. Worth popping in.

Do not miss Marina Boat Cruise. The 1.5 hour boat cruise along with well spread Dinner and Tanura Dance on the boat was a unforgettable experience.With the boat having 2 decks and more tha 120 persons on board, it sails in the Marina lake which has bee developed very well with a 7 km walkway lined with various resttaturents facing the lake.

"Best of all". Had a luxurious yatch experience with my friends over the weekend.I wanted to try this out since it was a different place and it turned out to be superb..Thank you so much in will definitely recommend this to anyone.
what a sight. cleanliness, calm, beauty, breath taking, restaurant in area so one can enjoy a relaxing meal either indoors or outdoor taking in the fresh air and beautiful sights

Beautiful view at night. We used to go on walks in the evenings, especially when it wasn't that hot. Plenty of cafes and restaurants to choose from. You can even take a water taxi as far as the Atlantic hotel. Approximately 7km long, it's a great place for a walk, more than once. A lot of tall buildings around it, great view.
One of my fav bars in Dubai..... You will struggle to find many better bars for drinks and also snacks with a stunning backdrop of the skyline and boats on the Marina.
Excellent place for an evening stroll. We have arrived there in the evening and had a long walk along Marina. Th buildings around and Yachts are great to see. It have made a nice evening walk.
Excellent. Ate here for lunch and dinner at 20/25. Fantastic food and service. Very good value for money. Sit outside.and enjoy the stunning views of the marina.
Just a Marina. THought it would be really special, was just a Marina with a lot of building work going on, not very well sign posted, certainly would not stay in this area.
Beautiful at night. What amazed me the most was the night view with the tall buildings on the backgroung, worth watching the sunset and night experience.
What a gem. Good value food and drink in a beautiful setting... The staff were friendly and helpful. Can't wait to go back

Magnificent view. A private yacht cruise was indeed fancy and the place was Marina. A great location to get out to sea. Great array of boats are there and boy did we get a beast. We had an anchor at the lagoon in front of the marina and it was a magical moment after sunset. Soaked in the Dubsi lights on the marina and the sea on the other side, listening to music and chilling on some soft drinks. It was magnificent.
Good way to check out skyline. Try this late evening, Breeze and beautiful skyline of Dubai is worth a try. Strongly recommend, it comes with really good food and drinks.
great marina with nice walk around. can get up close to some decent size motor yachts and also make enquiries about hiring them out. Nice change of scenery and pleasant to walk around
Great place for a romantic evening. Good place overlooking the Dubai Marina and in front of all the parked boats. Awesome for drinks and food. Highly recommended.

Very nice and good location. Went on a boat trip which started and finished here. This is a good place for people watching and socialising with the so called elite. Drinks and food are on the upper side in cost but it's expected in this location. Over all you will enjoy yourself. Just don't fall in.
Do not miss.... Nice place for a night walk or morning jogging and for a coctail and shisha in late summer nights. You can spend some time at Marina Mall too

Take a walk around the marina. We are from Vancouver and had read the Dubai Marina walkway was designed by Concord Pacific after Falsecreek sea wall in Vancouver. It was wonderful to walk it from our starting point at Dubai Marina Yacht Club. The view of the marina and all the towers around it made for a nice setting and getting exercise and fresh air with the walk was great. Easy to get to from the Metro.
Lunch. Lovely location and plenty of expats having lunch. Average lunch to be honest but filling in time before our yacht hire.
Excellent. Staff were too friendly, had lots of fun with drinks and food, we visied it in sep 14, with family, loved the yatch ,

good place to see the richness of Dubai. This place screams how rich the place is with so may yatchs down there and jetting in and out. Briliant place if you have someobne who can take you one, like we had .

A night out with the hubby. I love this place, the food, the atmosphere, the views...it is one of my favourite restaurants in Dubai and although outside seating is smoking the views are just stunning.

beautiful. We took the metro to get to the Dubai marina. This is one of the most "wow" places to see, so much wealth, it is totally incredible for "normal" people like us :) Beautiful jachts, nice walking path, nice bridges, If you have a good orientation, you will end up on the beach, very cool !
very nice. great time here with my future husband, in the end of march there is the art street show with music player

Friday Night Brunch - not what it used to be. Dubai Marina Yacht Club Friday Brunch (7.30pm-11pm) used to be my favourite brunch in Dubai - with cocktails and all you can eat seafood starters along with sushi and dim sum setting it apart from the other brunches.Having booked the brunch last night, we soon discovered the sushi, dim sum, cocktails and roast joints along with the dessert room have been removed from the menu yet the brunch is still the same price (350 aed) for house wines,spirits and hops now that cocktails have disappeared.Please bring back the original brunch menu and up the price rather than removing the best parts of the brunch to keep the price the same.

Boat trips. Marina area is very large with an attached mall. Boat trips of every description are available. Travel around the marina on a dinner cruise or take a high speed rib ride around the palm. Plus others in between.
Amazing sail out into the sea!. We had leased a Yacht for 40. The sail into the sea was breathtaking looking at the amazing skyline that Dubai has developed.
Amazing!. We just drove around it on our bus tour, but worth going to see. It was so huge it didn't even look real. Very interesting.
a good boat show. this years boat was nice and worth a visit with so many overseas participants and some great boats to see

WOW!!!. From the fastest, sexiest, historical, the Dubai Marina is amazing. Surrounded by some of the tallest skyscappers in Dubai, it feels like you are in another world. Its also very accessible and plenty of places to eat and shop, you will absolutely love it!!

Good meals at reasonable prices,. Enjoy an easy time away from the hustle, good food and a small beach to enjoy, very peasant staff and you can check out some of the sailing boats doing some races, plus children can learn to sail, lovely
Superb Location. Nice enough bar in a superb location, looking out over the marina. but overall lacked atmosphere. It is very popular with the ex pat community.
Great food. We ate at the Boardwalk and have to say the service was impeccable and the make the best cod, chips and mushy peas in fact all 4 of us ordered that for dinner. Would recommend !!

If I Win The Lotto. The Dubai Marina was only a short walk from our Hotel, and there were some outstanding Yacht's on the water, all in keeping with the wealth that is Dubai. It's a lovely place to sit and dream or watch the joggers, running past. This will be me when I win the Lotto.

Holiday at Dubai. The trip was good and it lasted for two hours. But the food was not upto the mark, very few servers were there. The place was clean though. They could have added some more activities during the cruise

Must Go. If ure at Dubai, and u havent been here, u are missing something. It has a nice view of Yatchs parked and large number of restaurants to sit and eat/ drink. and the backdrop is Dubai skyline. But go only around 6pm and stay till 8pm to see the lights, etc

Sunset Marina. Its a nice place to visit in the evening, there are a lot of attractions available like dinner dhow cruises, multiple restaurants ranging from fast food to fine dine, from french food to Indian food. Most of these places offer sheesha / hookah. The Marina is surrounded by tall residential and financial buildings. Perfect time to go is during sunset.
Good night. Been on a Tuesday night a couple of times always very busy as it's ladies night 3 free drinks always a bonus. Di is good worth a vieit
Best Place in Dubai !!!. It was a soothing time at Dubai Yatch Club , got lovely pictures clicked and it was very relaxing out there.

Relaxing and central. The entire complex offers diverse facilities - from dining to recreation including the Dubai Creek Golf Club. It is centrally located and offers a very relaxed atmosphere regardless of the purpose of your visit
Luzury yachts at affordable price. You get to live your dream. Rent a personal yacht. Enjoy party with friends and families. Its amaizing

Cruising in Desert. Set in the heart of ‘new Dubai’, Dubai Marina Yacht Club (DMYC) has rapidly gained a reputation as one of the renowned private yacht clubs of the region, with a purpose built clubhouse forming the centre-piece of four distinctive marinas. Arrayed along the length of a remarkable 3.5km canal, the marinas provide sheltered berthing for over five hundred yachts, in a setting that is simply unrivalled.More than simply a club for those with yachts or a love of the sea, DMYC was founded to satisfy the finer things in life, with the clubhouse and state-of-the-art marina facilities ensuring a five-star experience.
Yacth. Well being a Cancerian I have always been a lover of water. We hired a private Yacht and it was amazing to go around the Marina area early in the morning!!!! To add a south Indian breakfast.

out of the blue. a great setting and a great place to shop- eat and drink and ofcourse sail. there are many places all along which can be enjoyed on both sides too though the sea food and the italian food is just wow here.the staff is gentle and great too

Loved it.. What a great find this was. I had read the various reviews about the setting and happy hour and I wasn't disappointed. We arrived just before 6 and happy hour was in full flow at pretty much 20 AED a drink. The music was good, the vibe was excellent and the setting just lovely. It was a little busy and no seats were available on arrival however our server quickly grabbed two for us as he spotted people leaving which was really nice. One criticism and its more a generic Dubai one rather than anything against this bar, we had 4 people behind us, 4 to my left of us and a group of ten just behind them. I reckon at least 15 of the 18 were chain smoking. Even although we were outside the smoke smell was pretty bad. Being from the UK we are spoiled with What a great find this was. I had read the various reviews about the setting and happy hour and I wasn't disappointed.

impressive and boring with average cafes and restaurants. I gues my tittle just about covers me!! we got bored after half an hour and had a lousy coffee in one of the many touristy ugly and personality less places. sorry....boring!!

Chillax on the marina. Just sit and have a drink in perfect surroundings lovely we ate breakfast here nearly every day it was ideal sitting outside especially January - once we had lunch here and it was very good
Beautiful at sunset. I went for Dubai Food Festival. It's a great place to walk around and see everything. The boats are huge!

A must if you go to ?dubai. We took the ferry from Dubai Creek to the Marina. It was a great boat trip and even more stunning to see the Marina as you come in from the sea. You can walk all around the Marina where there is loads of seats in shade to stop and admire the buildings and the boats. The walkway is immaculate and perfect if you find difficulty in walking as it is so flat and not a bit uneven. Feb!

Awesome Place, Amazing views. Amazing views. surrounded by beautiful skyscrapers. awesome at night. food is excellent. staff is very friendly. 1 hour boat trips are available for a decent price.nice to have a chat with friends outside. or even have something all alone. definitely worth a visit.

Nice. Thats a nice trip..you can have a boat for some 900 Dhiram for 1 hour for a trip around the marina..if you are a group of 10 persons..its worth it..otherwise you can also take the taxi boat..its fun
Nice place for an evening drink. This was a very nice place to sit outside with friends for a nice chat and a drink to end your evening in Dubai.
Amazing . This activity was amazing! Had so much fun with my family! The view from the yacht was breathtaking and the food was so so good! You don't want to miss this activity while in Dubai!

Decent. good service, decent food, 20% from staying at the Nuran Marina.Nice looking out over the marina, although you can't have a drink outside, you might if upstairs, but we had children so were onLH allowed upstairs with children if eating, and the menu was more expensive. My daughter was excited for ladies night on a Tuesday, but we didn't know legal age for drinking is 21, so that was a disappointment .

Epic at night. I've never been in Singapore, but heard my friends comparing this area to Singapore while naming Singapore one of the best places to visit in the World. But if you are in Dubai and want to enjoy some "Singapore views" - it's a place you should visit. When it's dark - just walking around makes you happy even though you have no alcohol inside your stomach. It's a really pretty area with tall and well lit up buildings, various restaurants and some boats in the middle of the composition. You feel really relaxed here (and remember that you still had no alcohol) just enjoying the view and seeing hours fly by. I liked it so much that I'll stay here during one of my upcoming Dubai visits. There are various hotels surrounding Dubai Marina and I can only imagine how it looks from floor 40. Should be epic.

Amazing location and view for drinks. The Yacht Club is a perennial Dubai favourite. the view from the terrace is stunning, especially at sunset and nighttime. It's a real must if you have visitors. However, the traffic getting in and out of the Marina is horrific, esepcially at weekends, so do bear this in mind.
Very Smart. The marina is definitely worth a visit, for a pleasant stroll, taking in the architecture, boats and people. The yacht club is a smart place and worth calling in for a drink.
Amazing View. Marina yacht club is worth to visit atleast once if you are in dubai. It is surrounded by all the skyscrapers. Most interesting is JBR around it.
Beautiful, balanced and serene. Beautiful, balanced and serene area. Good for a quite diner near the bay and to walk around. Easy to get by metro and tram.
A quiet outlook delight. Lovely. Quiet until the evening music starts, in amongst greenery with a view over the creek. Good views of yachts. Definately a place to chill out.

Nice getaway. We stopped by on a late Saturday afternoon and stayed until after dark. We took the metro to the Dubai Marina stop and then took the tram (3 AED) for a view of the marina area prior to alighting at the Marina Mall stop.We walked through the Mall to get to the Marina promenade. We found a bench and watched the hop on - hop off water shuttle, families walking along the promenade, and people enjoying the rented quad bikes and other people-powered activities.There are lots of restaurants along the waterfront. We opted for the budget option which was the food court on the top level of the Marina Mall. There is outdoor seating with a great view of the water and skyscrapers - if you can find an available table.On the way back to the metro, we walked to the Metro and skipped the tram.
BEST YACHT CLUB IN THE WORLD. I would say Dubai Marina Yacht Club is Best Yacht Club at Dubai Marina. Surronded by huge skyscrapers. Best time to visit will be late in the evening post sunset.
Beautiful walk. Walk and dine along luxurious yachts and motor boats! Best area of Dubai to chill at night. Shopping malls are good too in the area.
Drinks and entertainment. If your are there over a weekend men must wear trousers on a Saturday, smart casual, didn't eat there so cannot comment, no dislikes to tell.
friday brunch. great service -unfortunately terrace closed due to sandstorm !attentive staff great food choice well prepared and displayed - unlimited drinks

Relaxing and quiet. Another walk from our hotel in the direction of the dubai mall brought us to the marina. A quiet almost secluded part of dubai even though it's on the main road. It has to be said that dubai makes as much use of water for waterways as our Victorian aa creators did.

GOOD FOOD WITH LOVELY VIEWS ACROSS THE MARINA. Had lunch there a couple of days ago and it was lovely to sit with good food and people watch and also see the various boats going up and down the Marina.Good value and enjoyable.
Perfect 2hrs get away. It's worth it going around seeing the best things. You will be taken to Burj Al Arab view and back while partying.
Must visit!!!. The Marina is the area with alltall dubai skyscrapers. The night view is just an awsome lifetime experience. Must visit when in dubai.
nice drinks anf pleasant vews. great views from the club on to Marina. Can be quite busy and noisy, especially in the Sports Bar during games on TV. Check for happy hour drinks.
Fabulous. Fab place with great views over The Creek. Lovely to relax and to enjoy a nice long cool drink. Also recommend having a meal. Fruit platter was super

Expensive...poor service. It's nice to go to the Yacht Club as it is different...&, there isn't any of similar place. We had dinner at one of the restaurants....food was ok... I wouldn't say great or spectacular....portion wasn't big... It is costly...same as the drinks.... Had a waitress who didn't understand my drink order & served me a big bottle of water that I didn't want. Argued that it is already opened, I had to take it! Sometimes, I feel the people in hospitality & customer service are lacking in understanding of English. Even if they do speak certain amount of English, they don't understand to speak clearly & probably, a bit slower so the customers can understand. Many times they just rattle through a sentence.
elegant and charming. the marina yacht club is sophisticated, cool and trendy palce to hand out, sail or catch a bite to eat and socialise. this is were you earn your street cred
skyscrapers!. The best place for a walk, dining - good ambiance. The skyline is amazing!!!! This is a must see place in Dubai.

excellent service, good atmosphere. DJ in house, very good music. Tuesday is ladies night and you get 3 free drinks. Although variety was very limited, the service was very good and you forget it was Packed! Special mention to the bartender Kundal, always with a smile, even in rush hour. The view is very nice, good ambience. My recommendation: don't be late, or you will spend and hour in the queue to get in.
Nice Place!. Perfect place for a stroll, sit and eat, take pictures as well.! I highly recommend this places at noon. The skyscrapers are amazing at night and the environment is more 'fun' .

Great for meetings and events. I was the speaker at a conference at the Yacht Club and it was great. The staff were attentive, friendly and very responsive.Our coffee breaks were outside overlooking the marina, which made for a wonderful backdrop. They even picked me up in a golf cart to shuttle me back and forth to my hotel.

Great place with horrible music. I really loved the view and atmosphere but horrible music played that night totally killed the whole atmosphere. I don't know if there was some country night happening, but music played that night was really not fitting the place and to be honest, music was also the reason we left after few drinks.
