Great place for a stroll. Wonderful place to take a stroll, look at the oversized million dollar boats, and grab a bite to eat from the many restaurants on the boardwalk. Best in the winter months of November to March.
WOW. This is a great place to eat, also you can view all the yachts, there is a pipe smoking area where you can sit and chill out
Lovely marina. Lots of lovely cafes and very impressive buildings. We took a good boat trip out to sea which was very enjoyable
Pleasant trip. Taking the boat around the Marina for two hour. We dined on a buffet style meal, great choice. A good evening out.

Fantastic Bar!. Lovely the Dubai Marina Yatch Club. Lovely bar to sit and watch the world go by. Great views of Dubai sitting right in the middle of all the towering buildings surrounded by fabulous Yatchs but very peaceful with music on in the background. Had a few cocktails here which were delicious.We visited on a Wednesday night and wished I had returned again another night during our stay. We are looking to go back to Dubai and will definitely be returning here.

surprisingly pleasant. Actually the place is surprisingly pleasant. The ambience is a bit snobish and everything around is ingloriously expensive, so it reminds me of some places of Cote d'Azur, like Cannes for egzample. But the temperature, humidity and greenery around make it a true oasis. The yachts are impressive but you wouldn't expect anything else in this place. Worth seeing.

Rich for a morning. Went on the yacht booked it for our son-in- law birthday, we all sent it was amazing. Give it ago we went all around the palm, had lunch and soft drinks, it was a great day, will book again in May

great place ! must enjoy cruise !. the place is smazing just near the morque , the walk around is also very good ! restaurants and skyline is amazing ! nightview is the the best ! take a good cruise in night to enjoy the view ! dont go for cheaper cruises ! take a white ship !
Stunning Marina. Worth visiting it is so Stunning, especially in the evening, when all the little light are covering all the palm trees and shinning in the water.

Birthday celebration. It was my husbands birthday and without asking they produced a lovely birthday cake and candles and the staff sang happy birthday to him. The food was to die for, staff were polite and made our evening. Cant fault it. The marina is so lovely to sit out in the evening and have a drink
Just go to enjoy the waterside ambience. Stay and enjoy a meal or walk (heat permitting). Probably not worth a special trip but dont miss it if you are in the area.

visit for an evening drink. This is the place to come to wander and marvel at the phenomenon that is Dubai. Its all man made and beautifully done . You can come for the free drinks on ladies night Tuesdays soak up the atmosphere and mingle with many expats who live and work in Dubai . Its a tranquil place .

Nice Place with lots to do. We rented a yatch for about 4 hours and sailed around dubai stopping at Burj Arab etc. JBR The Walk is also very close by (15 mins walk) which has a parade of restaurants and also a lovely beach.
Friday night Buffet is a winner. Super service, lots of different food, and reasonable price for a full package with champagne, wine, beer and everything.
little venice. An excellant place to wander around at night when all the locals and visitors come out to have a walk and bite to eat.

Good in winter. Its quite good in winter, be prepared with pull over and jackets which will be very useful as there will be chill breeze throughout winter. Dinners is nice, but not great for veg like us, better to visit for a sun set
Ladies night fun. Very busy but for a very good reason. Beautiful views and free drinks for girls on Tuesday nights - what more could you want?! This place is what Dubai is all about.

Get it wet!. A day on the water is perhaps one of the best ways to experience the very best of Dubai from a unique and relaxing perspective. The boats are exquisite, the architectural parade a marvel, the water pristine, and the weather simply perfect. The man-made canal is impressive, the Palm island is a monument to opulence, and the land reclamation simply amazing. If you are fortunate enough to have the chance, do not miss this.
Beautiful view over the Marina. Great view over the Marina from the terrace (especially at night), good atmosphere, many expats coming for drinks in the evening.
Great views from the terrasse. If you want a quite break with a coffe and enjoy the best view of the marina - this is the place to go

Great place. Beautiful place to meet up with friends for a drink. recommendable to take a walk around the artificial lake and having a quite nice dinner at Restaurant. Not expensive and high quality of food.

Finest Yacht display. The Marina is beautiful. The Yachts are interesting to view. You can "google" name on back of yacht, and find a lot of information about the owner and the vessel. Similar to those you can see in Nice, but located in a different part of the world. There is an area where you can slip inside and cool off while viewing. This was especially helpful in July!

Good place to visit. we had visited the yacht club and hired a yacht for a long one hour xperience it was really worth hiring , the view of the marina was mind blowing , the Atlantis and the Burj Al Arab magnificent.

amazing. take a long walk around the marina and marvel at its construction and the buildings that surround. Busy and full of life with after work joggers and families. Good restaurants all round the marina
Yachts, view, music... everything was amazing!. Luxurious... nothing else to say :D had a fantastic time, deffo a must visit! both nice to take pics in the day and in night time

Don't think twice for enjoying this place...Just go for it...!. It was a completely different vision that was waiting for me and my wife at the time that we reached the club.I give all the credit to my wife for taking me there and we both spent almost three hours multiple dishes that were so filling and trust me - the later part after that cuisine was worth every single penny.Few words about the joint-1. Lively crowd2. Spontaneous support from staff3. Delicious dishes with awesome presentation4. Value for money5. A lot of adventure (in food and...)All you need to worry is about your mind (who won't be willing to get away form this place).Just go and leave the rest to them.....
Wow.. Had a family cruise from the marina yacht club to the burj Arab, Atlantis. It was a really beautiful experience and the whole family were wowed by the experience, will plan on doing it again.

Silent and peaceful. Come here for a drink at the bar near the pier and away from the crowd everywhere. It is equally as good as sitting in any good standard bar just that this is more quiet and private. Might be chilly in the winter.

The Caribbean?. We went to the Yacht club for the Caribbean BBQ. The location is spectacular in the centre of the Dubai Marina. The building is attractive. The highpoint of the afternoon was the guitarist/singer who entertained us royally. Very talented guy playing music with a Caribbean flavour. However that was really the only "Caribbean" flavour to the afternoon.1. The food was mostly overcooked and the meat of poor quality.2. The hot food section was tepid at best.3. The salads were minimal in choice.4. The only choices of "package" is with cocktails or soft drinks. So what if you don't want either softs or cocktails and prefer wine. So we paid for soft drinks which we were not offered and did not want as we required wine.The staff were attentive although the chefs were not generous with their portions, I had to ask for more on each visit to the BBQ. So not a great experience and probably one that I wont repeat. Shame because the location is good.
Nice view. It looks like New York city at night with the bright lights and the beautiful sea side with a l t of restaurants and coffee shops
Just amazing. I love boats. Their are my passion from childhood and I was stund by how many big and beautiful boats are there. I wish some day I will have one just like that.

Good romantic place. Good romantic place, filled will high rise buildings all around. Food is lovely.Good romantic place, filled will high rise buildings all around. Food is lovely.Good romantic place, filled will high rise buildings all around. Food is lovely.

Dubai Marina Bay. This is one of the most amazing locations Dubai has today.The entire creek and the building made across it were planned and done is the most amazing way it could have been done.The most prominent location in Dubai, there is lot to do in the area particularly i.e there is a yacht club from where one can get speed boats and yacht on hire, there are many nice restaurants located on the waterfront and spend the evening out there. There are some water sports as well that takes place out there if somebody interested in doing that during day time.Highly famous within the European expat community working in Dubai and one of the sought out location for residential purpose. Location is suitable for all from family, to couples to friends so one and all.
Dubai Marina. Nice place to walk, nice restaurants, nice buildings, Very Hot, plenty of night life, Tours in a nice boat by the creek, just seat in a Cafee shop and watch people
Expensive. Very good for walk and spending romantic evenings ........ Beautiful sights and cool breeze . But restaurants are overrated.
Chill out. A wonderful place to hangout with friends..... has a beautiful terrace lounge overlooking to the MARINA.

SO Overrated. Taking my husband for a drink, remembering he still wanted to visit the Marina Yacht Club. It's really nothing special, the views are nice but not unique. The food is way to expensive for what you get: average dishes with creative plating. I would not recommend going here for dinner, the bar area is nice enough if you just want to get a drink at the water side ;-P
Nice walk and environment. This area is very trendy and classy with a nice vibe.Good restaurants and peaceful away from the bustling crowds. Water taxi was convenient to get to JBR
Lovely to get away from the Palm. Nice food and a great location, also we was staying on the Palm we was getting ripped off with food and drink, the prices are more competative.

Must do. Most of the traveller are not aware about this. I went there as one of my friend recommended. Its superb in night. Lot of activity a Kids can do. we hire yacht and take round. It's not that costly but give you romantic feeling. I enjoy.

Many yachts. You can go inside normally. It looks like it's an exclusive club but it's open to public you can go inside and go down see the yachts closely and take your pictures just don't order anything cause it's way too expensive

Between the riches. We went to Dubai Marina just to have a nice walk. We were amazed at the buildings and surroundings. Everything is so beautiful and well looked after. So many restaurants and shops to choose from. Some construction activities that is going on there that does make things a bit noisy and busy. But good place to have a Friday afternoon walk.

Very nice place for living. Made a night visit. Don't go without camera - beautiful ambience. Very good travel connection with rest of city. Exists possibility for boat excursion. Renting of apartments in this area is not cheap.
wow. This place is amazing, skyscrapers line the marina which has some fantastic yachts in it...nice restaurants too.

Recommend. It`s very nice area - the most important is that walking is possible. Niview of all skyscrapers araund. There are many cafes and restaurants with very good variety of food and drinks and free wi-fi.

A lovely surprise! :) Must-do in your Dubai trip.. The marina dinner cruise that begins from here is a lovely surprise to your Dubai itinerary. We took the Xclusive boats cruise, and the skyline as your yacht moves farther and farther is a sight to behold. The peace you experience as your boat moves farther away into the Dubai Marina, with a star studded sky above, a sky-scrapper studded skyline in front of you and refreshingly cool sea breeze grazing your face is something you will have to experience yourself! And the dining experience amidst such a beautiful setting is the cherry on the cake :) A must-do activity if you are in Dubai.I am not sure if the creek dinner cruise will be as good... but the Dubai Marina cruise, that begins from the Dubai Marina Yacht club rocks! Oh 1 tip though - a lesson we learnt the hard way - if you are taking a metro to go here, dont get down at the 'DAMAC/ dubai marina' station as its quite far from here. Instead get down as the next station 'Jumeirah lake towers' and the Dubai Marina Yacht club will be less than 200 mtrs away, easily reachable on foot.
Up there!. Met some friends from our local village who were coincidentally holidaying at the same time.had a fantastic evening at the Marina yacht Club highly recommended but take plenty dirhams!

Excellent Experience. We took a yellow boat tour at 4:45 PM for 90 Min which included Atlantis, Palm Jumeriah and Burj Al Arab . This tour was brilliant and had great sunset views in sea.Our skipper was great he took lots of photos and gave ample time for photos too.After the tour we walked around the promenade until Dubai Marina Mall which was lovely . Promenade is dotted around with lots of restaurants serving all kinds of cuisines. We had a dinner in one of the restaurants at Dubai Marina Mall and then took a 10 min water taxi back to Dubai Marina metro station.
Awesome Place,,. Very Vibrant and lively place,, Must visitYou see a totally different Dubai here where people from all nationality party together,,

Trip to Atlantis and Burj Al Arab by boat. We hired a boat for 8 people at 3:00pm which took us from Marina bay to Atlantis and Burj Al Arab. The sun was low so not too hot, just good enough to enjoy the wind in your hair. Best part was photo shoot near the iconic buildings .

Great place to dine. We had our farewell dinner at the Yacht Club and all four of us opted for the lamb shank on the menu. Now I am a softie when it comes to this dish but must admit that the meal placed before me was undoubtedly one of the best lamb shanks I have eaten anywhere! Wine is served indoors only but the setting is so nice that we sacrificed that just to sit outside and absorb the atmosphere.
Very Pleasant. Beautiful place to meet up with friends for a nice drink and a chat, especially if the weather allows you to sit at the outside terrace.
One of the best in Dubai.. I love it. I went there with my cousin and we love each min we spent there. This place is Just amazing during the night. Highly recommended.
Magnificent. Amazing time had by 7 of us. Niece chartered yacht for her wedding day in Dubai. The whole experience was faultless. Would definitely recommend.

Great Taste All Round. The Yatch Club was one of the highlights of my visit to Dubai. The views was spectacular and the food was fresh, exquisite and filling. Definitely a place I'd revisit and recommend.

Nice marina. We chartered a yacht out of this marina last year and revisited the area this year as we have friends that have an apartment overlooking the whole area , it's nice to have a stroll here and the yacht club offers a good selection of drinks and food.
Lovely at Night. We stopped here quickly for some sights after a late night in Abu Dhabi after one of our Grand Prix days. A great place to unwind at night with a meal at one of the many restaurants.

Lovely place !!. This is the perfect place to unwind, let your down and relax. The ambience is superb and the drinks amazing. The only downside is the un attentive service which has loads of scope to do better. However, I enjoyed my experience with my fiancee and we look forward to visiting again with friends next week.
Worth the visit. Worth a walk, impressive buildings and nice "local" ambience. Rivera side walk and cool for a bicycle ride
Chill, drink and enjoy the view. A nice place to consider for a pre-party warm up. Make sure to cab your way there on weekend to avoid disappointment of heavy traffic.
Christmas gift. This place is magical, just cannot express it in words. My man gave me a treat and this place was one of many places we visited but when I got here I was astonished.

Nice place for relax. Dubai Marina has something magic that words cannot describe. A ride across the lagoon, a drink at a terrace, a walk around the shops and restaurants… these are one of the lots of activities one can spend his time when visiting the marina. Whilst you're there, don't look at your watch. Allow yourself lots of time if you want to enjoy this wonderful place.
Great place for Expats who've just arrived!. Or at least, that's how it was for me, 2011. Great views of the water, drink deals for ladies of course. Buzzing, yet laid back. Nice style.

You might visit. You cant go to Dubai without a visit at Marina Yacht Club. In case you have the opportunity to take a yacht tour - GO!!! You will sail all over the city and will be just next to turistic point as Burj Al Arab and Atlantis.

Sunset at Marina Beach Yacht. I spend a beautiful sunset at Dubai Marina's Yacht Bay. Very recommendable to take a walk around the artificial lake and having a quite delicious dinner at Istanbul Restaurant. Not expensive and high quality of food. A most while you stay in Dubai
Lively on a Thusday Night. Had a bit of a bash in there. Going like a fair that night. Nice views overlooking the marina with some fine nibbles.

Stunning. Small get-together with some work associates, loved everything about the place, first time here, certainly not the last. The food was tasty and more reasonable in price that I would have suspected. Happy hour seems to run from 6-8pm. Service was effortless and made you forget you were in dubai.

Worth a visit. The marina does have a certain special feeling about it. The many stylish buildings around the water, the yachts the many restaurants give you different feeling compared to the rest of Dubai. Plan on spending a couple of hours or more in the area. Need to go back nightime as I only been there during the day. Don't miss it.

Lovely views, nice crowd, good happy hour. Probably a place I have visited with colleagues, friends and work events more than most other places in Dubai. Parking is easy, food in Aquarra is always good, but mostly the bar and terrace is the place to go ! Always a good atmosphere, good service and happy hour offers are usually of a good choice. Was there Sat. night and even when it is a quiet night they always have good music (Great Duo played).

Amazing, relaxing. Nice place to walk, to visit, to have lunch or dinner. For everybody, adults, children, couples, family and friends.Beautiful view. You can see all around the most beautiful buildings of Dubai.

Ladies Night Afterwork. In Dubai since few months... Very crowded afterwork inside and outside with a view on the yacht desk. Generally young people (20-30). Ladies night on tuesday from 8pm. Nice place

Beautiful marina view from the terrace. The Dubai Marina Yacht Club as the name suggests is situated on the Dubai Marina. Undoubtedly the highlight of the club house is the terraces. It is delightful to dine on the restaurant terrace on a winter evening and watch the passing marina traffic. The food is of excellent quality; my lamb was cooked as requested, juicy and tender. Prices are a little pricey for overall standard of the venue but not exorbitantly so.

A night to remember. I went with my wife for the weekend night at the Dubai Marina Yacht Club... and the starboard overlooks the sprawling marina... the weather was nice and chilly and the perfect ambience for music and some quality time with my spouse... a must visit..

Lots of boats to rent!. I like that there is nice food. I also like the Marina. There are lots of different sizes of yachts and the different crews give quite competitive prices, so there us something for everyone.......almost!

Worth a visit........... This is one of the few non hotel locations in Dubia where you can buy an alcoholic drink. There is a lively bar and also a restaurant on the ground floor. The upstairs bar is also lively in the evening and the terrace is a good location to watch the yachts and pleasure boats cruise by whilst enjoying a cocktail or two!

The Aquara restaraunt in the Dubai Yacht Club. This fantastic restaurant overlooks the Dubai Marina and during the cooler season is a must for travellers to Dubai. It is a 5 star restaurant with 5 star service and 5 star food but not fine dining so it is on the fair price side rather than expesnive in Dubai terms - highly recommended you will not be disappointed -ask for table over looking the marina
Impeccable. There are really no complaints possible... The place is absolutely stunning ..perfect especilly at night

Fantastic breakfast. An excellent breakfast that is not for the faint hearted. Served in a frying pan this breakfast consists of all the qualities wanted in a British style belly busting breakfast. Just when you think this can not get any better you have an amazing view of the marina.

The most European part of Dubai. In the Marina you can walk around at any time of the day. The promenade around the marina is perfect for just strolling around among other locals who are out with the stroller, friends or out jogging. The restaurants at the promenade might be a bit overpriced but it's perfect just to sit down with a soda or a coffee and just admire the skyscrapers surrounding this perfect manmade marina.

2 for 1. I would advise to wear trousers’ or smart jeans as was told they can be fussy who they let in, and happy hour is 2 bottles of Stella & large wine 18 dirhams. You can drink outside overlooking the Marina and the million pound yachts. Well worth a visit

A pleasant Pub Grub Marina side lunch. Came here for a business lunch.My colleague was a regular.He had fish and chips, which were HUGE.I had the Thai Seafood Curry, which was excellent.It was too hot to be on the patio, but it would be great for lunch (or dinner) November to March in Dubai

Breath taking view.. say no more.I usually go for Lady's night and sometimes the music can get very good.The venue is great, most importantly is the view that it offers.Pricing wise it's quite average go-out price in Dubai.Not too fancy pricey not cheap either.The location is also great because if you want to move on from this location you have plenty of other choices by walking distance.

Hen night, soon to be bride. I had an evening brunch here which was great value it included mohitos other cocktails and house beverages for only 350. I will be returning in the new year with my Husband

Love the atmosphere. Great spot for a glass of apperitive. I love the scene of little lights from the building across the water. The choice in the menu is ok. Food are tasty. But it s qutie pricey in this area of Dubai. If you like to splash out..This is the place..:)
Nice view. Nice and quiet place ti go and have lunch or dinner.You can stay outside on the many terraces .Lovely place!
Amazing. If you love yachts and boats, this is a must visit. They have everything here and its nice for taking a walk and browsing yachts :)
EPC end is session . Wow amazing place food was awesome. Staff very friendly. Would recommend anybody to visit and have meal drink. Atmosphere was good. Good night had by all.
Well worth a look. Great location and reasonably priced. We have been for a few lunches and breakfasts here. Now with metro and tram system easy to get to.
Very nice. It was my firt wow in dubai !!! This place is also very nice during the day. Normally Dubai is nice in the evening.. but this place is very nice all the time
Roast dinner. Saturday roast- fantastic value for money, amazingly tasty and breathtaking viewsWe managed to get a table outside which overlooked the marina at nightRecommend you book
Lovely food. Nice relaxed afternoon at the yacht club, excellent service, lovely cocktails and food, definitely recommend a visit.
ladies night. We went here for Ladies night.. Had a great time..the service and surroundings were great.. Highly recommend

One of the best place in Dubai where you can have a walk.... One of the few places in Dubai where you can walk and you are not inside the shopping mall. Beautiful view of the marina and Dubai, a lot of pleasant cafes, shops. Good place for a night out.
Peaceful area. We had a very pleasant walk here & restful coffee after getting off the metro following a day's shopping at Dubai Mall

Drinks in the evening. sit outside, enjoy the view, have a drink and relax. Chilled out and good views. Different experience if you sit inside so try to get a seat outside and then you can exit straight from there and walk around the marina.

great walk in a tranquil area. Peaceful atmosphere with family and kids playing at the fountains .Kind of a town of its own. walking path to and from the Metro Staion which are pretty and exception in Dubai

Yacht trip anyone?. We went for a yacht trip via this venue and had the drinks at its bar in M-level facing the Marina quay with such a lovely view. Live band is playing in the terrace outside and adds up to the charm and ambiance.
Still one of the best settings in Dubai. Great atmosphere, great food, drinks even decent price, (at Happy hour!), nothing is priced fairly in Dubai, but happy hours make it a little more bareable!

Nice bar - great location for outdoor winter drinks. I would thoroughly recommend this bar. I attend regularly and love dining and having a beer on the outdoor area. Service is normally good and the music is relaxed with a DJ providing the tunes.Have a look - its definitely worth a visit. Happy Hour between 6pm and 8pm where its BOGOF! Ladies night on a Wednesday.
Party & Drink For Free. Men get a free drink on wednesdays and women o thursdays. great ambience in the amazing new outdoor club with a magnificent view of the marina and yachts parking.
VERY NICE MARINA. This is one the most exclusive places in the exclusive part of Dubai...Only rich people live here and have a hotel room near by is very costly

Stunning at Night!. I had first arrived in the afternoon and the view was simply beautiful. The amount of sophisticated and expensive yachts was truly a sight to behold. Luxury is an understatement to what you see. After having supper, the view at night is just stunning. well worth a visit to view the grandeur of your surroundings.
very clean place to roam around. It will give you a very dramatic view of the place. Nice to see all new kinda yachts and give you a feel of luxury
So Beautiful. Amazing food, Brilliant service, And a stunning view! would highly recommend a visit! slighty expensive but if your in dubai you can splash!
Lovely place. Good atmosphere, great views, great coffee and staff very friendly.Very relaxed and inviting. I would recommend this for an afternoon stop over.

Went by metro. I think this is the place to stay. We visited for the day. Had pizza lunch which was very leisurely. We ate inside as it was very hot. Lovely and cool inside. Got the water taxi. Then had a catamaran trip in the afternoon evening. Everywhere is spotless. Great location

Must See!!!. Amazing buildings and nice path to walk on. This is must see place during the day and during night ( coz its even amazing when lights are on ). Dont forget to have tasty burger from Johny Rocket ( at Marina Walk )

Birthday party. Was last week there at Birthday Party of member of a very nice Family....All friends where there....from couple Continents they came especially for this event.Food is always greatly prepared,Red Vine has always a specific taste...Suppose havent drink with weeks :))))) .Really recommending to visit the Club.Great Experience
stunning. Its like another world. Service, food scenery amazing. We had a table next to the water,beautiful.we loved it and so did my granddaughter.

Best Place for quality living. The whole place is so well crafted with a Marina walkway surrounded by tall sky scrapers. The best part is that you can take stroll, take a boat ride and then sit and relax in any of the restaurants along the walkway. The whole place shines in the evening with all the buildings lit up.
good buffet. Nice restaurant on the marina with a very good roast buffet. The starters were mainly seafood when we went but I understand they have a new chef so that may have changed now
Dubai Marina. Scenery, water fountains, locals were there. One of the few places that we saw children running around

Views, lively and good value. I have an apartment in the Marina. If you want to have an alcoholic drink in the Marina then be prepared to part with a considerable wedge of money.However, Tuesdays is ladies night, three free drinks for ladies, almost every night has a happy hour with selected drinks two for one until about 8pm. Very good value.The views are very nice indeed and the place does get very busy and so has quite an exciting atmosphere.I do enjoy a visit on an evening when I am in Dubai.
Beautiful Views with Great Sand. We really enjoyed the water, views and the sand. It is tucked perfectly within the city and in walking distance of many shops and restaurants.

Hire a speed boat for an hour!. At Dubai Marina, do hire a boat to view the palm islands and cruise the marina outlet to the Gulf sea. We rented a Speed Boat for an hour, free drinks, had a swim opposite a private beach and thoroughly enjoyed the adrenalin rush to speed down the channel. Also an excellent photo opportunity and view of the Marina from the sea to give you a whole new perspective!

Great food and Views. Looking for a relaxing evening with friends or sitting overlooking the creek then this is ideal. the food is great and the atmosphere is even better if you can get a table outside. I suggest that you call and book first.

Family friendly brunch. Attended for brunch with Friends. Good value, per person. Very good selection of food, smaller variety of drinks (in brunch offer). Lots of good helpful staff members. Family friendly, highchairs & good baby change facilities available.
nice. very nice place for a weak and relax ,for me i try the cruise trip it was one of the best time specialty for a family trip on weekend
far from center - not worthy to see. I was not impressed by the marina, skyscrapers all around, no park and almost no greenery... not worthy to see.
Free drinks on Ladies Night. A buzzing place with fantastic views at night, Tuesday is free for the ladies, it can get very busy with some big quese but we knew someone special.

Yachts yachts yachts . Here you get to see a lot of yachts and you have walk over the place and chill. You can also book a yacht and have a fun ride.There are lots of restaurants with Al the cuisine...Easiest way to get here is take a metro and get down at Dubai marina stop,from there it's walking distance(10min walk)

Worth not missing. It was my first time on Yacht. but if we had come back without doing it is difficult to explain what we would have missed. Start sailing around 6pm and view sunset from right between the waters and the dynamic view of the city on other side. its just mind blowing. after sunset as it gets dark the skyline starts shinning and that view is also not worth missing. the view of burj al arab from the yacht was the best.
“Delicious food, good service, amazing location”. Great and romantic place. Has awesome views. The river cruise offered by them is also good. Great location.

Worth a cocktail.. Really good people watching bar to go to, especially went the band is playing. Not many seats so be prepared to be quick when one is free! This was on the decking which the views are amazing. Be prepared to wait for your drinks too.
Still being built. Outragiously expanded and quite stylish in a Dubai way, but in October 2014, lots of "opening soon" signs everywhere

Excellent food, service and location. First class food, excellent service and nice setting. Downstairs sports bar for a drink and check out the scores, downstairs restaurant for excellent food and service, upstairs restaurant for another excellent meal with nice setting looking out to the very expensive harbour area and pontoons. Highly recommend both restaurants and the bar.

Exceptional. Wonderful service and food at the yacht club. We sat on the outside terrace. Tables we places with so much space you felt there was no one else around. three course meal with wine came in at about £140 which for what we had I thought was great. Lots to choose from and all cooked to perfection.

Best place for breakfast with Bacon and pork . If you want breakfast with pork sausages and bacon, you can't go far wrong. One of the best in Dubai, with great views of the boats in the marina.Also Tuesday night ladies night is a great night for a few beers in a relaxed unpretentious environment surrounded by friendly people. Great musicThursday night start of the weekend is a busy night with the Dj playing some great music but not so loud you can't have a conversation.
Amazing views of marina. Went for a few drinks during there happy hour. Worth a visit as the views are stunning of the marina. Staff very friendly to.
Boat Cruise from the Marina Yatch Club. Our partners arranged for a boat cruise, dinner, music and generally a nice time. The weather was very hot, but luckily the boat was airconditioned.
friday night buffet. we came here on friday night for the food and drink buffet, a lovely selection of foods to choose from and the desserts were amazing, would definitely recommend on a friday.

Ladies night fun. We went here as a group for ladies night an ad the girls get 3 tokens. They are proper drinks not the watered down/small ones you often get with tokens. People there are quite friendly too so if they're leaving they will often give you their tokens. Unfortunately there was no dance floor- bit the dj outside played some good music. The outside looks over all the luxury sun seeker boats and the skyscrapers around the marina.

Delicious food, good service, handy location. I recently visited here for dinner with my boyfriend and his father. We all had starters and mains and were very very pleased with the food. I had sashimi salmon for starter with sea bass for main, really really nice! We also had 2 bottle wine from the offers menu which was tasty. It worked out about £35 a bottle. The bar area was heaving being a Thursday evening, we booked the table ouside in the restaurant part and I am very pleased we did. The whole restaurant outside was full, a good sign! The service from one specific waiter was fantastic, promt and friendly but not too overwhelming. Would return here in a heartbeat :)
Awesome views. Great and romantic place. Has awesome views. The river cruise offered by them is also good. Great location.
Relax and enjoy. This is a lovely place for a meal and to relax after and enjoy a Sheesha. The views over the Creek are beautiful.

Very Tranquil. We were shown downstairs to a bar on the left and requested a table outside as it was a beautiful sunny afternoon. Alcohol is served inside only - the bar seemed to have only a couple of "suits" engaged in a business meeting in there, with no atmosphere, so we opted for virgin cocktails and the view. My virgin mojito was absolutely to die for! We enjoyed the time we spent there, then on the way out, we realised there was another bar on the other side of the staircase, which was heaving! Mind you, we still would probably have sat outside - this was our first experience of Dubai following a night flight and a few hours sleep in our hotel, so we didn't want to just sit inside a busy bar. We understand this is a very popular place in the evening - definitely worth a visit at that time, if you can squeeze it in.

Yacht cruise Dubai. Such a wonderful trip on dubai creek with Yacht. I can strongly recommend, if you get chance dont miss yacht cruise ride.. there are so many yacht rental providers so you can easily hire one yacht and enjoy your Dubai trip. If you fee this entertaining activity is costly just buy kobonaty yacht rental dubai discount coupons. Have a fantastic holiday in Dubai..
Serene. Popped in for evening drinks during my visit, lovely place! Very idyllic. Staff were lovely and friendly, atmosphere very relaxing and the views pretty fab too!

Nice spot. We only visited for drinks before we had a dinner cruise on the marina, we were made to feel very welcome and were escorted to the upstairs balcony, the view was absolutely lovely and it had a real chilled out atmosphere. We came at the right time as it was happy hour 2-4-1 on all drinks which was a bonus.When we visit again we shall definately return

Nice place, nice ladies night!. I've been there many times, because my family has a boat there.The place is lovely to have dinner near the harbour views.The ladies night on tuesdays is very nice but normally is full.... The terrace has an amazing views and eveybody wants to be outside.Prices average and quality ok
Good place to relax and enjoy the view. We liked the dancing fountains. It was a good place to relax and enjoy the view. The kids also had a lot of fun dancing around the fountains.

get there early. Went for a few pre dinner drinks before heading out on Marina night tour, great sport bar located in the yatch club, great service and cold beer, lots of TVs. friendly staff , many nationalities, really good place
great place!. amazing scenery! enjoyably fun, great experience for travellers in Dubai.. must see for friends and families

Great View and great Food. Even if you don't have a boat you can always imagine. Visit here for the great views, great food in pleasant surroundings. We stopped of here for lunch, service was excellent and the food matched it. Prices were reasonable so would go again.

Spectacular. The Marina is simply amazing. It is so clear, of course it is because it is in Dubai. The yachts against the amazing skyscrapers will blow your mind. You can rent boats here and take a 1-2 hour boat trip. In addition, there are restaurants and hotels close by. Bring your wide angle camera lens too!
Lovely Place!. Absolutely fantastic place to relax and enjoy the view. High recommended !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I Love Dubai.

Good food ,excellent ambiance. The quality of food was very good. The "25 degree 55 degree" Bristo provides excellent ambiance and cusine at reasonable price.It is about 10 mins walk from Marina Metro station.

Nice bar on the marina. Dubai Marina is a nice place in Dubai and this bar sits above it with a nice view of boats tied up etc...I would call this a trendy bar, with Armani and Gucci etc...on show.Beer is pricey but the view of well-lit buildings, different color lights etc... makes up for it.Did not eat here so cannot comment on that.
Great View. Loved it here nice view over the Marina and the yacht club food was really reasonable compared to other places I have eaten in Dubai.
Breakfast. Always take visitors here for breakfast. Something for everyone. The fresh pineapple juice and the skillet - breakfast of champions.

Go for evening brunch (yes, brunch of an evening). Lovely ambience, service lovely, great views across the Marina, live music quite fine. Food selection out of this world, everything cooked to perfection (the sweet room is like Santa's Grotto for those with a sweet tooth). Not one criticism possible.

Holiday 2014. Go at night it is beautiful. The marina is lit with beautiful lights and the boats in the marina are amazing. Ladies go on Tuesday nights as Tuesday Night is Ladies Night. You get passes for 4 free drinks but you can only have wine or vodka (or a non-alcoholic drink too I suppose). Well worth a visit.
A nice place to unwind. The outside seating are nice to chill with few drinks while overlooking the marina. A perfect setting!
Must see Dubai Marina. After the Burj Khalifa you must see the Dubai Marina during day and during night - to see the light. You can walk along .... Easy access from the Metro.
Brilliant Views. Visited with my partner for a business meal and was not disappointed. Lovely food and amazing views would definitely eat here again.

Great area and views. This place is called "Little Manhattan" because it has over a dozen skyscrapers in one small place. Many of them over 100 floors! Great area to walk around in with shops and restaurants.
Love it. Love it here whether its for a bite to eat or a stroll looking at all the yachts. Food and drinks are well priced
Great view of the City. Visited to see the Marina but was met with a spectacular views from the yacht club and surrounds, the sports bar was great to catch on the football back home.
Dubai Marina. It was right next to our hotel, we enjoyed the views of the Marina. We took dinner cruise at night and enjoyed the views of marina at night. Will go again
Beautiful in the night!. A lovely bar with lovely views. A nice way to round off an otherwise busy day. They always have offers and play lounge music throughout the evening.
Lovely venue for a drink. We visit quite often as its a nice venue for a meal and a drink. As a side note the pub downstairs serves pork meals.
casual times. the area is very nice during the week days, but not recommended for families during weekends, a variety of cafes and restaurants with amazing view at night time.

Great For A Drink. We passed by here on a Thursday evening and went for a drink. We couldn't drink in the main bar as we had sandals on (they have a dress code) but we had a few drinks in the sports bar down stairs. The cocktails and drinks were not too badly priced and the staff were really friendly.
Great place to unwind!. Blue waters and gleaming yachts with a multitude of eateries around to enjoy the view of the setting sun, what a pleasure!

Cocktail Hour. My friends and I like to go to the Yacht Club for drinks. It always has a good crowd and music. Can get busy towards the end of the night, but they're always booked for dinner and lounge tables so make sure to plan ahead if you want to sit.

Amazing. Had the chance to participate at a birthday party at this wonderful place.  Since the beginning, it started good, nice table outside with fan( a hot weather), perfect seated near DJ/bar, and of course The view. It was a really nice night, the service was perfect, the waiter a superstar( sorry I don't remember the name), and thank you for the manager in charge, how was there all the time, it was indeed perfect. I now for sure I will go back there, it is one of the perfect place to go in Dubai Marina!

COLOURFUL. From the road, you can not comprehend what unfolds as you traverse through the YATCH club towards the Marina. The stunning wood clad staircase is quite imposing. I didn't particularly like the surprisingly low variety of meals served for a club that has berthed on its waters, an eclectic array of well maintained yatchs. If the meals were of the same variety of drinks and yatchs at hand, it surely would be more fun to spend time there.
Dubai Marina. Dining and walking around Dubai Marina is a must-do in Dubai. It's very romantic at night, too. This is one of my favorite places in Dubai.
super service. maricon is superb service staff enjoyed lot there , like to visit the place again.good ambience as well
Taking in the sights.. Beautiful view over looking the marina,great atmosphere lots of restaurants and nice to take a walk.
One word - Fantastic. What a fantastic location, great atmosphere And great service.I would recommend this to anyone who is visiting. I would order the cocktails as they are very nice

Magical Brunch under the stars!. A lovely experience with a beautiful venue. Very much enjoyed sipping cocktails over looking the marina. Plenty of food choices especially the sea food. Should not be missed!

Nice view easy Walk !. Nice area with various International Restaurant & coffee around.
Long way to walk. Nice view :) I liked so much this area :)

Great visit. Lovely views. A must visit whilst in Dubai to watch the sunset and have a few cocktails and a lovely dinner with your loved one. Charter a yacht for half a day, the latter part and spend the late evening at the Marina watching the sunset. Bellisimo.

enjoy ;). Nice place, nice people, nice view!A perfect place if you compare to the Buddha and other Must have seen places.It is calm and quiet but still friendly.Take a cab, JBR is not far so parking is just creasy

Classy but expensive. Went here on a Thursday it was very busy, DJ playing decent music.You can drink outside with nice views of the marina Only gripe - €11 a pint ! Even got Dubai that's expensive!Worth a visit tho

Very noisy, bad service and food is average!. The only positive is that the view is pretty nice. Otherwise, everything was bad! It's way too pricey for the quality of food. The menu is limited. The noise level is horrible, it's impossible to talk. I will not go back!
Yellow boats are fun. Try the yellow speed boat tour , it is good fun . Great view of atlantis , the palm and the burj sl arab.

Tuesday night. Atmosphere was very nice, no problems to get in, even for a group of guys taking into account that it was ladies night. Nive musicThe only negative point is the price, which is quite expensive. Anyway, I will go back for a couple of drinks.

Great view, great vibes!. The Yacht club is a cool, trendy cosmopolitan bar situated in the Marina. Overlooking the water and the Dubai skyline, you are always guaranteed a fabulous view, particularly when lit up at night. If you're a lady head down there on a Tuesday where you get 4 free drinks, and enjoy a party atmosphere with great dj's and vibes!
Great View. We went for a drink there not cheap bottle of wine but priced fair for Dubai, but you will not mind as the views over the river is fantastic.

Good Chill out Joint. Good bars, which have great offerings and happy our specials. Menu is more than adequate and the food is great. Good yacht mole side setting. Parking is a pain, rather walk or take a cab
Thai Buffet - Good Value for money and great food. The noodles and seafood was great, unlimited beers and wine with the alcoholic package. The atmosphere was a bit dead.

Lots of fun and plenty of food. Located in the heart of Dubai's marina district (think large, expensive yachts), the Marina Yacht Club was a great location for Friday "brunch". Remember, Fridays in the Emirates is like the States "Sunday", and because of Ramadan, meals weren't served until Friday evening, but what a selection they had. Everything from sushi to prime rib to seafood to quiche. The layout was easy and spacious and the staff was efficient and attentative. Our party of 8 really enjoyed ourselves.
Very Good.. Lots of restaurants to choose from and the food is usually very good. The Buddha bar is very impressive (but possibly a little too loud music wise - maybe I'm getting old!).

Sevice and Food as Advertised. Really nice dinner and drinks experience (especially on deck from October to April). Nice view of Marina, which I think is more interesting than the sea views in Dubai. Service is very good and food is not over priced for the quality. Definitely a place I will go back to in Dubai.

Great location. This is my second visit to the Dubai Marina Yacht Club and although I am a member of Yacht Clubs in Australia you can visit here with out formality. The big plus is that you can get a drink here and sit and look out over all the beautiful power boats moored up in the Marina. At night you get a very different ambience with a Manhattan type setting. Food is served all day long and there are a number of bars and restaurants open mainly in the evening. The Bistro on the ground floor is open all day and food is good and reasonably priced. The service was also very good and courteous.

Great views. Yacht Club is great for a local place to go for a drink...they also serve food which is nice. Have the ability to sit inside or outside. I highly recommend outside as you get a view of the Marina/JBR, stunning in the evenings on a night with a slight breeze. Summer months is way to hot to sit outside.
Beautiful Evening. We had a great dinner at the Yacht Club. You get amazing views of some of the most expensive boats and a must see in Dubai.

Great place. Took my sis here while she was visiting, she loved it, different to the bars i go to and i really enjoyed it too, grand views of the boats, DJ was playing some good music and could actually mix, drinks weren't too cheap, but maybe because i'm usually at pubs more. great experience for my sister. cheers.
Beautiful setting. Amazing views of some of the worlds most expensive boats. Also look great at night. A must see when in Dubai.
super night. had a few nights here which have been really good the food is good and the location on the marina is good had a good meal here and not expensive..good value and service

Wonderful place to spend an evening. We had a superb meal at the Yacht Club, could not fault this place in any way. Staff were brilliant, polite and very friendly. The food was to die for, cooked to perfection and very well presented. We will definitely be returning to the Dubai Marina Yacht Club on our next visit to UAE

Great place in the middle of the marina area. The Yacht club is one of our favorite locations to visit in the marina area.
It is great as you can drink, unlike many areas in the marina.
Nice to watch the yachts go by, or to dance and socialize in the week.
They also do a great brunch and good ladies nights

Don't Go on Ladies Night. The venue is lovely, the staff are lovely. But on Ladies Night it's really it's like being forced to watch an episode of that depressing TV product The Only Way is Essex. The DJ is persistently absent from the decks (outside chatting) and plays the blandest music imaginable. He looks entirely bored by his own music. They might save their money and just put any playlist on. It would be the same. Or possibly better. If you want to visit, go during the daytime, or on any other night.
Wine seems stronger!! ; - ). One of my favourite bars in this city! Wine definitely seems stronger always bit tipsy when I leave, then that could be the amount consumed. ; - )

Breakfast. went for breakfast with some friends- overpriced and not that great. Nice location though, i have heard there nite brunch is good so may have to try rather and give the breakfast a miss if i go again.
Beautiful place to oggle the beauties.. The Yatchs. Feast your eyes on these beautiful yatchs.. One better then the other.. if you are a Yatch enthusiast .. you gotta go there.. :)
Lovely. What a great place to take visitors. It is beautiful and many places to walk and eat. Brunch is fabulous!

very nice area at night. great buildings all aroundgood service at restaurantsnice to do walking or jogging in the areawith excellent views of new buildingssoo many touristsgets kinda crowdedspectacular views

Ladies night....... I went on a tuesday with the girls. Great atmosphere, great music, great laugh. And ladies also get 3 free drinks each. We got some bar nibbles, which were excellent and very tasty.
great for after work drinks. As my local bar, you cannot beat this place for location and atmosphere.Happy hours on weekdays, are like canary wharf just after office hours.
Excellent place to hangout. I enjoyed being there, specially the view and services were amazing. Food is great and not that expensive.

Rude people! Not Recommended!. This place has a great setting but seems to always be full of financial advisers from deVere who are drunk and fighting, spilling drinks all over you and not apologizing, this happened to me and my friends on regular occasions. Not a nice place for a relaxing drink.
A place not to be. Went there by night. Around us screaming people making party. Hmmmm. That's not the right attitude for a " yacht club"

Regular Diner. I have dined both upstairs and downstairs. I love this place, casual dining downstairs with a great breakfast option, more sophisticated menu upstairs, which can start you off on a good night!

Great all day breakfast!. If you have a craving for an Full English Breakfast then 25 55 is the best place to go. Located on the ground floor in the Yacht Club it offers both Indoor and outdoor seating. The food is great and reasonably priced, so overall it's good value for Money!
Must visit. After watching it every morning from my hotel room across the Marina, visited here. Next time would surely take a dining cruise here..

Fantastic Food, location and value.. Had my engagement dinner held at the the Yacht Club. The staff were fantastic in helping, organize our dinner for 30 people. The chef cooked up a special menu for us, Italian, the food was great and authentic. The value for the A star quality was really a good deal. Would recommend it!
What a nice spot.... Go there, it's a must.Grab a dinner or a lunch there, you will love the experience.Take a catamaran or a dining cruise as well, you will enjoy it for sure.
Drinks, drinks and more drinks!!. It was ladies night which meant 3 free drinks before 11pm!!! 2 Happy irish girls so!!! Packed but music was great, shared a table and met some interesting people!!!

Highlight of our holiday. Dubai Marina Yacht Club is a stunning place to visit for a drink or just a look around. It is quite select so you'll need to dress appropriately. We went on a Tuesday night for a few drinks, which was ladies night (4 free drinks for ladies). The view is breathtaking but beware the outside verandah is not air conditioned so can be very oppressive in the summer months.

Beautiful. We had the chance to get on a private cruise and we had so much fun. After the Marina cruise we hang out by the restaurant overlooking the marina, very nice view, great food and superb service. We visited again after a few days, we hanged out at night time, great crowd, lively music and we were happy as usual.
Be sure to stop by.. Easy to get to using the metro. So many tall condos in a small area is impressive. Worth a look where you can have a snack or a meal while viewing the marina area.

Too loud and nothing special. The view itself is nice and the the surrounding create a nice atmosphere, but it is so not local and occupied by loud and noisy people, that you want to go somewhere quiet.
great ladies night. Excellent ambient to the marina promenade, a place to share cozy moments, drinks and fun with friends
Big Yachts. If you want to see big and luxury yachts, Dubai Marina Yacht Club is right place to visit. You can also enjoy Dubai Marina Skyscrapers from Dubai Marina Yacht Club.

One of my favorite spots. This place is definitely one of my favorite spots in Dubai. When I have friends over from out of town, I take them here as it's got an amazing view, great atmosphere and good service. The ladies night gets pretty hectic and packed but it's all good fun.
Great. Great atmosphere great view, great food, what more could you want. Get in early if you want a nice place to sit. Also restaurant gets full as it's not that large.
a must visit. the speed boats from the Marina are a must visit, nice people are posted there who give a detailed tour.
Amazing Place. The best place in Dubai. Colourful lights at night, quiet and peacefull. You can just seat at be there for hours. Amazing skyscrapers everywhere and full of great restaurants around.
Great party place at tuesday night. We went there at tuesday and than it is party time. So I don't know about the food, but I do know drinks are great :-)

Sports Bar. Needing a meal and my normal watering hole was shut I went to the sports bar at the Dubai Marina Yacht club.There was a very friendly welcome, service was excellent, to the point of moving a table so I could see the rugby rather than looking through some guys head.I would like to mention Ei Ei, Omar, Nitesh, Rubel, Myra, Okil and Edward for a very enjoyable meal and evening.
Great night out!!!. Great meal, great live music whilst looking out over the marina with all its dazzling lights.... Gorgeous.
The best thing its seafood bar. The tour we hire, included a dinner cruise in Dubai yatch marina, were in the restaurant and bar we recommend the seafood, and desserts are varied,

nice view. like the view by this place, close to the Metro station.easy to walk . ,the sun feels extremely so advice to use sunblock or avoid .Close is the Mariott Hotel, if you prefer to wacth the Jumeirah Palm at the 52 floor , relax and comfortable.
Great Place. Food is always great here and the view overlooking the marina is superb.Great bar if you just want a drink and they usually have live entertainment. They offer great cocktails too :-)

Great Place to Relax. The yacht club has 2 bars. The one downstairs is a sports bar and the upstairs in more of a night club. The restaurant downstairs is casual fare and they do serve pork for those bacon lovers. The servers there are very nice, especially Nanette, Amanda and Eiei. The security, particularly Felix, is very helpful and friendly. It's a great place to watch the boats or watch a sporting event in a smoke-free environment. (You can smoke on the patio)
Where the beautiful people meet.... ....to chat, drink & overlook some incredible yachts! Dress code pretty relaxed ...but be prepared to look the part
The boats, the skyscrapers! :D. This place is just amazing.Dubai did not fail to impress me at all.I would love to go back there one day.Manuel

Hired Yatch. We hired a yatch to take us around the palm the burj al arab the marina - they provided drinks and music and the marina its self is breath taking faboulous boats and the building are out of this world. Amazing!! #dxd #mydubai
Construction site. Construction of a tram is going on right now. Plus a revamp of the Marina front so we did not have access to it :-( Will be nice once finished.

Bridal shower . My friend had a surprise bridal shower on this yacht! It was awesome! The food was great and so was the service! The yacht was nice and clean! Very spacious , I absolutely loved upstairs, out in the open!
Great for ogling Yachts!. Lovely, clean, refreshing environment. With restaurants, and a few bars for a drink. Also a great place to go running in the mornings. The path ways are pretty wide.

good atmosphere. i came here with an old friend, we chose the 'all you can eat and drink' menu which was very good quality and great value. the variety of food was extensive with seafood, salads, sushi and cavern followed by desert. good choice of drinks as well. the service is very good and the view fantastic.

Yacht club/marina. The yacht club is a good place to take a tour boat and explore the coast line, dine in with a view of the marina or enjoy a pub. The marina staff and wait staff are always friendly and helpful. Afterwards you can walk the marina promenade to any restaurants or the marina mall. It's a nice area of town.

Beautiful way to spend the evening. The walk is very beautiful with all the yachts and boats in action. It shows you yet another face of Dubai's luxury. You've to get down at the JLT metro station and walk down to the Marina mall.

Tuesday Ladiesnight. Every Tuesday evening free drinks for Ladies. The special thing is that it starts really early but ends also early (11pm), closing at 12. Since it starts early it looks more like a after work place, you will see everyone showing up in office outfit. Have drinks have fun.
Nice yachts to see. Its a lot of walking around. Have a nice lunch at Approns and Hammers (seafood restaurant) with a nice cold beer or wine while looking at all these impressive boats!
Great British Breakfast. Excellent views of the marina and surrounding area. Free valet parking and the food is fabulous and good value.

Observatory. Its good. Nice welcoming party. We went for dining over the bar and were served by a very engaging lady. Ribs and fish. Both were excellent. Wine list is odd but a good Malbec was reasonable. The bar after. Cool view. Smoking corner Well staffed and priced.
Not the best of meals. My wife and I can for dinner.Very plain, lack of seasoning and poor service. No management to be seen.Don't think we would venture back again.

Very memorable night at Dubai Marina Yacht club!. The Yacht club is a very trendy place to hang out. We had some nice dim sum & prawn rolls, while enjoying some (a lot) of drinks, all with the great view of the marina. The service was excellent and the atmosphere had a buzz. The DJ played some tunes! Great place for a night out.

Very pleasant stay. Only 10min far away from Marina Mall.Nice time in the Club.You can order Beer or Wine,there is big choice.Eating very taste sausages with potato.Very relaxing atmosphere.Must visit it,opens Friday from 12:00h

Love it !. The Dubai Marina Yacht Club is an institution in Dubai ! The drinks are great, service always prompt and the live music never fails to dissapoint :)
Dinner at Aquara is excellent too. Portion sizes are great !

cruising in Dubai Marina. Dhow was good, dinner was excellent, Indian theme, as for the entertainment part, there was some Egyptian folk dancing which was not bad at all.. over all we enjoyed the cruise that lasted for a good 2 hours.
Great place for a break. Lovely location with a plethora of restaurants and supermarkets (that stock Waitrose produce!) friendly and safe day and night,

Go there in the evening. Great place to hang out and have food and relax. if you are free in the evening, so there around 5 Pm type and you can hangout till late in the night. There are plenty of option for food all over.
Highly recommended. This place is a gem. Lovely views - perfect for that bottle of Champagne...and great brunch deals on weekends..
nice. nice walk in a place with spectacular views both by day and by night. the restaurants along the way are a little bit expensive, but the view totally worth

Simple, yet wonderful. This place is mostly famous for it's location In the Dubai Marina area where you can enjoy an excellent outdoor scenery of the towers out looking the JBR strip and be meters away from many expensive yachts.

throw your money in the water. At least that's what it looks like. Millions worth of yacht's lay in the Dubai Marina. Apprently for no obvious reason besides them being constantly polished by large crews of worker bees. An average 3rd world country could nurture it's people for a decade if all these yachts where turned in to development money... Sad and beautiful at the same time
Lovely. Very lovely place, the view is beautiful especially at night. There is a nice restaurant located within.

Go for the view... We came here mainly to take a photo for my father who lives in Trinidad and spends his life at TTYC (Trinidad and Tobago Yacht Club). We only stayed for one drink before going onto dinner -but wow..the view! I have been to a few yacht clubs,,and never seen anything like this. There is something pretty awesome about seeing all of these mega yachts surrounded by mega skyscrapers. Go for the view.
Nice eye candy for boaters.. If you like yachts and enjoy marina views , this is the place. You can have a classy meal while watching people and scenery. Marina Mall is situated close by.

Have breakfast! You ll like it. The most recent addition to the DMYC family of marinas, Mall marina is uniquely located directly in front of Dubai Marina Mall, and offers superb access to the large variety of offerings of the mall (including restaurants, cafes, Reel Cinemas, Waitrose supermarket and many other retail shops), the lively atmosphere of the strolling promenade, and the Address Hotel Dubai Marina.
Fab yachts. Well worth a visit just to see the amazing yachts...you can cycle around the marina too which is a great way to travel and the breeze cools you down!

Classy spot for a drink and dinner. DUBAI Marina looks great from most points, but this place mixes a thriving atmosphere and good food with fab views.Many of the yacht excursions start from here, so this is a good place to eat first or meet - or to start/spend an evening.The food is top class, but it can get a little noisy later on for conversation at the place livens up for the night.Great balcony overlooks the yachts and Marina skyline. Then it's an easy walk or cab ride to JLT or other Marina eateries.
Great Bar Scene. The night I went the Yacht club was brimming with lifes beautiful people. It was vibrant place and very interesting to people watch. We ate downstairs later which was a lovely meal.

Boat Cruise. A wonderful day cruising on the water, our Captain and crew were attentive and very helpful. The on board amenities were neat clean and very tidy. Our meals and drinks were marvelous, we at times were directed to seeing specific sights. the entire day was wonderful and crew most assisting and very helpful; and courteous

Great view. We ve had some drinks with a friend enjoying a superb Marina view, surrounded by Yatchs and a very good atmosphere. Definitely an after work or pre dancing option if you are in Marina area

RUDE. VERY VERY VERY rude! we were here for a marina cruise and the receptionist made us feel like second rate citizens, VERY RACIST maybe she didnt realize that shes not native to the UAE either she herself was from the Phillipines. She basically told her that we were not allowed to sit in the lobby where there are COUCHES clearly available to sit while we waited for our yatch to depart. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!

They do full english with a view. And thursday after work drinks.. Get involved. Its got a cracking view and good bar with a big balcony to look at things from.Wow - look at all those tall buildings you will think. Then have a sip of your peroni. Its nice here isnt it?? Yeah. Shall we get another drink? Yeah. Its better than Byblos next door. Ill have a G&T this time.cheers.

A Restaurant /Bar with Great Views in the Largest Marina in the World.. The Marina has 3 outlets which include a bar on the ground floor along with a comfortable restaurant /bistro for light meals. the main attraction is the main restaurant on the balcony floor.Fantastic views of the Marina , boats and water compliment great service and very good food and wine. We have been to the Marina Yacht Club on so many occasions we have lost count even though its 30 km from home for us.
nice view and relaxing. If you want to relax and calm your mind this is the best place in the marina area. Aside from that you can take a walk for exercising.
Lovely location for dinner. Visited this place a few times with friends, superb location across the Marina. Delicious food and wines and nice ambiance if sitting outside.
Sundowners a must!. Enjoy live music and classic cocktails as you watch the sun set behind the beautiful buildings that are the Dubai Marina. Happy hour from 6 to 8 daily!
Walking zone. This a good place to walk and to get out of the Hotel AC ! You will have also many place for a drink or a dinner
relaxing. It's like sitting in an isolated island but close to your world.Everything is for your service, the staff are so kind , the food is perfect and the ambiance is cheerful

Won't let kids in the bar. We walked for ages to get to the yacht club. Friends had suggested it was a great place to go. We timed it just right for happy hour as well and it was a lovely building.However, happy hour is only available in the main bar, where children are not allowed. They told us the kids were welcome in the bistro but drinks would be full price.We left!

OK and they sell bacon. The highlight of this place is that you can get real pork bacon, not the horrible turkey bacon everywhere else sells. It's ok, looks out onto a marina, but overall, nothing terribly special - except for the pork bacon!!!!
Great place to take in the who's who!. Sit on the deck whilst you enjoy some drinks watching the well to do coming and going in their mega yachts.

Good after work hangout . The Yacht Club is always nice to visit on a weekday after work. The view as the sun goes down is always beautiful. More responsive staff would make it even better as there are sometimes long wait times in between drinks. The music is good and there is generally a friendly crowd. Ladies nights are just too busy for me personally but very popular with most.

Good place for the afternoon. Good View, great boats, you can rent them there and you can also find different water activities that you can do. there are some great restaurants and it is a great place for those who like jogging afternoon.

The Boardwalk Restaurant. A fun and busy restaurant with a great location over looking the Creek. We watched the sun go down over cocktails and then enjoyed some fabulous fish. A perfect day after golfing at the nearby Creek Golf Club.

the beautiful club. We visit this yaught club everytime we come to Dubai, my aunties balcony overlooks it, it is a beautiful place, inside and out! the food is gorgeous and the cocktail and wine meue..so much choice! We had a very special evening here last year, we dined here on the terrace after we got engaged, it will always hold special memories and always be a place we visit, highly recommend for happy hour, lunch or dinner! its 10/10 everytime! service,setting and special memories make this place stand out!

A Place to have fun and get out some energy !. Very nice place on the marina , where all expats go .. a place where you can get to know new friends and have a drink ..dance Very decent .. and ellegant ! and fun!
Excellent place to visit. Very photo friendly, many hi rise buildings and a great place to walk around, took a boat tour from here to see the Atlantis Hotel on Palm Jumeriah and Burj Al Arab.

Nice place to hang out. What makes this is the view over the marina. Without this, and the terrace, it's really just another bar. Nevertheless a nice place to hangout. And three free drinks on ladies Tuesday's ladies night

OMG super like for this one. This is definitely worth a visit, The fee is on the higher end but u will not get this experience anywhere else. u feel like u own it. Its beautiful. The staff is friendly n make u njoy.The yachts are clean n nice. Must visit and is close to sky dive

Ladies Night?. Amazing but its not just for ladies -up to 9Pm (not sure when it starts) but every Wednesday you can get 3 free drinks vouchers .You need to book if you want a meal and then you can use these for alcoholic drinks i.e. wine etc- I ordered a rib eye steak -the best ever and reasonable priced. The atmosphere is amazing bit noisy music and once you've "spent" the vouchers and need to order more drinks be prepared to wait as long queues but for a good night out fabulous

Great Atmosphere. In February, it was great to have an outdoor table over looking the Marina. Food was good and service efficient. After eating, we enjoyed the music and drinks. Dress-up for a visit here.

I loved it. My colleague has a yacht, so if anything I was in good company. The bar, service and facilities, were new to me, I loved the atmosphere, especially if you have the chance to meet other expatriates. I try to avoid the locals, especially the ones with new money, otherwise, it a great place to visit.

One of the best!!. Had dinner here twice on this visit and we have agreed that they were definitely top this time! Once again the service was first class and the view over the Marina is stunning. Again, a must if you are staying around the Marina.

Nice marina location. Dubai marina is really lovely to hang out with friends. Tuesdays are great at the yacht club if your looking for a lively atmosphere and nice crowd. Service is overall pretty good - cant really fault this place!
Breakfast. Fabulous breakfast cooked in own frying pan. Fresh juice ,toast marmalade, plentiful. Overlooking the marina views outstanding

Nice marina - lots of restaurants - great walk - no alcohol served by law!. You must definitely go there! it is a beautiful marina with many many reastaurants to choose from, lots of lights and it can get really busy.
It is a big marina so you can have a nice long walk there!
You should have in mind though that restaurants there cannot serve alcohol as it is restricted by law!

nice just to have a drink. food very expensive and very small..
I like just to have some drinks in the terrace.
Music very loud..

FANTASTIC. We live up the road from the Yacht club - itts a great location for drinks. We usually go for happy hour from 6 - 8pm on a Friday.. the views are wonderful and the prices in happy hour are very affordable.

One for a lazy evening. Great place to hangout, get a leisurely walk through the Marina, sit in one of the many marina facing restaurants, or take a boat ride to the palm jumeirah island. So many choices of things to do. Once you are here, you are transported to a very classy walkways in Europe.

Alcohol only inside. We wanted to have a beer and enjoy warm weather and the view of marina, but alcohol was only served inside and there was tinted windows so could not even see outside. I felt like second-class citizen only because I wanted to have one beer.

1st Class service. Have eaten here 3 times firstly back in November 2013 and more recently 2 visits in March 2014 excellent meals on each visit. On our second visit this March the girl who served us remembered us from our previous visit a week earlier and even remembered what drinks we had. That is personal service indeed. Try the Beef Cheek or Lamb, both melt in the mouth. Go downstairs it's much quieter than the room upstairs. If you want to drink alocohol make sure you sit inside.

Dubai Marina Yacht Club. Various bars and restaurants at the Yacht Club. Ladies night on Tuesdays, but I like the sports bar for when I watch the rugby. A lady on her own in Dubai can be frowned upon in bars, not so at the Yacht Club. Always welcoming. Bar snacks are not bad either.

A piece of heaven. I enjoyed the Marina view very much... the whole place is a wonderful spot where to hang out with friends or meet for business.
Several bars and restaurants offer good food in a great environment.
Do not miss to visit while in Dubai

Njoy at late evening...... Well manage yacht arrangement in Dubai. During your Journey, you will enjoy food, music, me me-cry, Kandura dance on floating way. Go with your loving that will give life time memory.
excellent. food was really nice, we had gone for brunch and whole day at the poolside, the service and food was excellent,

Full of people who love themselves. Full of people who wearing loads of bling and walked with their nose at a 45 degree pitch. Seemed very false. One beer choice on tap and can't sit at the bar for a drink. Not my cup of tea at all. Service slow

Good English Breakfast. Friendly service.
Nice english breakfast although not huge was very good.
Chairs were not comfortable without the cushions which were all away for washing apparently.
Service staff were a little difficult to catch in-order to get the check and pay the bill.
Overall a good experience, especially if you have a craving for real pork.

RTA Ferry Terminal. There are few ferry routes from here depending on the time of the day - I think it's 11am, 1.30pm & 5pm (please check !)The ferry will take you on the coastline of Dubai where you get a good view of all the beautiful buildings - the Palm, Burj Al Arab & from far Burj Khalifa up to the Creek near the Heritage Village.I think this is a very leisurely way to travel & only costs 50 AED for all the route. You can only buy the ticket on the spot before embarkation.
Nice for breakfast and lunch. I was invited for business to have a magnificent breakfast at this place which look great plenty of expats of a great quality

Night life. Many restaurants by the marina. Beautiful scenery and enjoyable dinner. be aware that they do not sell any alcoholic drinks anywhere there. You can find Indian, Israelic and other arabic restaurants. Look around and up: you will be surrounded by boats and lit by the colorful lights of the skyscrapers around you.

Magic setting. I've been to The Yacht Club just twice at night and absolutely love it's situation with lighted boats cruising past....modern... comfortable... romantic...all those and I would rate it 5 Star except for the food. We were there on a recent visit and had 'finger' food but I thought the quality fair to poor and the quantity not great either. I hope to enjoy the setting again but next time for drinks only. I enjoy food but resent paying when the quality is not acceptable.
Vibrant. A wonderful place to sit on the balcony and watch the boats and people go by . A really vibrant area , full of bars and restaurants . A fun way to spent an hour or so .

Great Place in Dubai breakfast/happy hour/ladies night. Whether it's weekend breakfast, drinks at the weekend or ladies night - Yacht Club is a very good venue. I recommend it for Happy Hour, dinner, breakfast and ladies night - although get there early to avoid the queues

Beautiful. very nice view and the design
very nice view and the design
very nice view and the design
very nice view and the design
Romantic and beautiful views. Beautiful marina and restaurant for a romantic dinner, a nice place to enjoy dinner and watch the sunset, but make sure you reserve on weekends.

Nice place. nice to walk and talk, however you have to watch your stps ))
you will need to go one more time to have the best out

Scenic and oozing Wealth!!. What a lovely area to wander around and take in the atmosphere and wonder how that many people can actually afford these impressive floating beasts!!! Terrific place to go for a relaxing walk and just take it all in!!
stylish!. Elegant walk amid skyscrapers, yachts and all sorts of restaurants. Nice beach with cristal clear water. I wish I could live there!

Such a happening place.... Such a happening place full of ppl from all countries,some enjoying the boat ride,some having hookka,some having food of all types.....not to be missed....specially at night....total party time..it's a two mins walk from dubai marina metro....so catch the train ...from ur nearest maestro station
scenic view. just visited the place for photo op. Specially at the back ground where you can see the twisted tower. architecture is splendid.
Luxury. Great Club with excellent restaurants would recommend to all including families as it has such a lot to offer. Advise to refrain from golf in the summer or you could frazzle!

Great food, great place!. This place is great for breakfast, dinner and drinks. The atmosphere is excellent. During the night they have live music. The quality of the food is excellent. You must try their "big breakfast" - is delicious. I love going there with my husband. The view is outstanding!!

A "refreshing place to go to.... I lived in an appartment close to the Yacht Club. I went there many times to have a bite, and talk with people. The food is simply great, and it is a very nice place to stay. First floor they have a meeting room, and a great bar. Impossible to NOT have a good time there...:-).Service is SUPER, and very friendly...I'd spread the news, a place to be for sure...:-)
Beautiful. Excellent place to visit. Very refreshing and pleasing sight. Met tourist from all over the world. Must visit again.

Beautiful & Spectacular views. One will travel by boat to go around to see how they built the hotel & Restaurant, everything is beautiful, the guide is explaining very nice in details, family will enjoy. If you have camera, its nice to capture those views for your life time record.
