Dreams are made of this. Oh to see how the other half live. Had arranged a cruise through a colleague and went out around the Palm. Seeing such wealth and investment in yachts was mind blowing. I couldn't afford the mooring fees let alone one of the smaller 'boats' Oh well. Dream on.

A nice stroll. The Dubai Marina is a nice spot in Dubai to hang out. The walkway around the marina is a long stroll filled with plenty of restaurants and places to smoke shisha! If shisha isn't your thing, well you can always enjoy the beautiful yachts scattered throughout the water! The Marina mall is nearby which also another nice place to check out when you're in this area! I enjoyed it!

5 hour cruise. We went on a cruise on a large boat with 2 decks. The boat came with soft drinks and water but we provided our own food. Jet skiing is not allowed though. But it was a nice peaceful day

Go for a walk. Been there thrice in my trip while in Dubai.Twice in the evening and once in the day.Place is impressive, looking at the yacths, the tall buildings, very close to the JBR Walk. There is Dubai Marina Mall nearby with good shops and restaurants.There are lots of other places to eat there as well.
Marina. the water was so clear. the boats beautiful and the club house. The lobby has a mens and women's side. We went on the mens side and it looked so fun, they even host trivia!
Do take a trip on a Short cruise. A last minute holiday plan by friends and cousins to take a two hour cruise on the harbour at sunset.+ Great Journey+ Very Photogenic sights
Nice view. Aquara is a restaurant with a beautiful view. Food is nice, good service but nothing special. Out of the restaurant circuit, but still an interesting option.
Good breakfast place and a great place for early evening drinks.. Great view, service, food and drinks. Good place for friends to meet and couples to enjoy a nice and comfortable evening out.

Wonderful Restaurant in Dubai Marina. Faultless experience. We had been told the menu was fairly limited, no matter, the food was sensational. My wife and daughter said it was the best meal they had ever had. We sat outside on the terrace overlooking the marina. Service was excellent, the views are stunning and the whole ambience of the Yacht Club is wonderful. It was walking distance from our hotel on Jumeirah Beach, absolutely 5 stars from us.(The Sports Bar downstairs was also great for me for all the Premiership football)
great lounge with outdoor terrace. great lounge with outdoor terrace,great ambience outdoors is amazing overlooking dubai marina yachts

Perfect Afternoon. Myself and friends went to the yacht club on a friday for there new tapas and cocktailsThe tasty tapas were served to us at the table although we could go to the buffet ourselfs if we wanted to.Staff were very friendley and kept us served with drinks, i asked for a specific drink that was not on the menu and they made me which was very accomadatingDj is very friendly and kept us entertainedDefinitly going back who would not like to spend friday after noon drinking cocktails with great servicve great views great food and entertainment295 from 2pm until 5pm all you can eat and drink! Bargain

Great view and location but limited menu. Nice for a relaxing after-work light dinner. Menu is limited in terms of variety but cocktails are nice. Great location. starting to get really crowded after 8 p.m. specially at the bar.

My Local. Dubai Marina yacht Club is open to the public and has a sports bar, restaurant and upstairs has a trendy bar restaurant with music and some private hire function rooms. The food is good and reasonably priced. The downstairs sports bar is a great place to watch all the major sporting events and the upstairs bar restaurant is a great place to chill in the evenings and have dinner and a cocktail. Sometimes they have a small Salsa band or DJ. All is good however the security (bouncers) tend to make up some unusual rules off the top of their head and can sometimes interrupt your gathering with with a rude comment with menace. Manager please take note!
Amazing. We went there in the evening. Got to see the sunset. Ate in a Libonese restaurant in the corner. The yatchs are nice and with the tall buildings and lights its really worth visiting.
Fab Cocktails with a view!. Great location, delicious cocktails and gorgeous big breakfasts!! Lovely views day and night whilst sipping on a drink

Well worth a visit...the view is stunning...go on a Saturday night. Had read a lot of reviews about this place, the biggest complaint was the inability to get a seat outside because it was so busy. We wanted to go for a drink there and found out there is happy hour between 6-8. We turned up at 6pm on Saturday. The place was very quiet. It dawned on us that the weekend in Dubai is Friday and Saturday and assumed that was why it was so quiet. Great news for us as we got seats outside over looking the yachts. It's a fantastic view, well worth a visit. Very relaxing place to be. We stayed for a few hours. The service was slow and difficult to get their attention to order more drinks. We ended up having bar snacks and they were fine, nothing special. The restrooms were immaculate...I do judge a bar/ restaurant by how clean these are.

Great food in a great location. Brilliant location overlooking the marina. Excellent buffet, not cheap at 350 DHs but drinks are free including tequila shots. Great food selection including lobster, definitely recommend.

Never disappointing. Second visit but was a little disappointed because we didn't make a reservation and hence could not enjoy sitting upstairs and had to sit downstairs. But as it turned out it was just what we wanted. We had the bangers and mash and there was not a crumb left on any of our plates. The service was good and the price wasn't too bad for Dubai. We love visiting here but remember to make a reservation.

Very slow service. We sat as a group of friends outside admiring the boats and the view as we had drinks. It's a lovely environment and a pleasant almosphere. We were surprised by the poor service though. We had to continually go and ask a server to come and take an order because they didn't check on us at all.Not a massive issue but we were also surprised not to be offered a choice of spirit brands. Unusual for Dubai.

Cracking on a Thursday night. Now that the temperatures are cooler, the outside balcony is ideal.Happy hour until 9pm.Well dressed crowd, certainly not for those coming straight from the beach.A good bar
Perrfect view at night. One of my favorite place here in Dubai, not to miss.Night view of Dubai marina Skyscrapers is one of the best.

Evening drinks. My husband and I visited the yacht club for drinks one evening and it was really lovely. We sat on the balcony upstairs with a superb view of all the money sat in their spaces in awe, not feeling jealous at all! :) The drinks were pricey as expected but it's not everyday that you have that scenery so we just enjoyed ourselves. We would certainly go back on our next trip and would dine there as the foos look fab!
